b'EASTER SUNDAY SAFETY TIPS: Easter celebrations often involve children participating in egg hunts or engaging in other activities. Keep an eye on children to ensure they do not play near electrical outlets, cords, or appliances. Educate them about the dangers of electrical hazards and discourage them from touching electrical devices or playing with cords to prevent accidents. Happy Easter everyone! \n#EasterSafety #ElectricalSafety #EasterElectricalTips #SafeEaster #ElectricalAwareness #SafeCelebrations  #FamilyOutingSafety\n#HolidaySafetyTips'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: \xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e! \n\n"On the first day of the week, very early in the morning, the women took the spices they had prepared and went to the tomb. They found the stone rolled away from the tomb, but when they entered, they did not find the body of the Lord Jesus. While they were wondering about this, suddenly two men in clothes that gleamed like lightning stood beside them. In their fright the women bowed down with their faces to the ground, but the men said to them, \'Why do you look for the living among the dead? He is not here; he has risen! Remember how he told you, while he was still with you in Galilee: "The Son of Man must be delivered over to the hands of sinners, be crucified and on the third day be raised again." -  Luke 24:1-7 (NIV):'
b"HOLY SATURDAY SAFETY TIP: \xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\n\nIf you'll be using electrical outlets at your outing location, take a moment to inspect them for any damage or signs of wear. Ensure that the outlets are covered and protected from moisture if you're outdoors. \n\nAvoid using outlets that appear damaged or compromised to avoid the risk of electrical shock or fire."
b'HOLY SATURDAY: "The next day, the one after Preparation Day, the chief priests and the Pharisees went to Pilate. \'Sir,\' they said, \'we remember that while he was still alive that deceiver said, "After three days I will rise again." So give the order for the tomb to be made secure until the third day. Otherwise, his disciples may come and steal the body and tell the people that he has been raised from the dead. This last deception will be worse than the first.\' \'Take a guard,\' Pilate answered. \'Go, make the tomb as secure as you know how.\' So they went and made the tomb secure by putting a seal on the stone and posting the guard." - Matthew 27:62-66 (NIV):'

b"Safety Tips on Good Friday: \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\nIf you're erecting or participating in processions or events involving tall structures, such as crosses or banners, be mindful of overhead power lines. Ensure that these structures are set up far away from power lines to avoid accidental contact. It's crucial to stay at least 10 feet away from overhead power lines when handling long objects to prevent the risk of electrocution."

b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5!\n\nBefore leaving the house for Holy Week events or vacation, we advise our homeowners to inspect their electrical outlets, cords, and extension cords thoroughly for any damage and make sure to unplug them to prevent the risks of electrical hazards, such as short circuits or electrical fires (DOE Secretary Raphael Lotilla)\n\nFor any concern, \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 #'\xf0\x9d\x98\x80: 0956 8120 0059 | 0929 130 4019"
b"\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: \xf0\x9d\x99\x91\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf \xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x87 \xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x95\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\n\nNEVER GO NEAR THESE AREA due to risk of \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1. When an energized line makes contact with the ground, the earth becomes ENERGIZED, and the voltage dissipates in concentric circles away from the initial contact point, making the electricity spread wider and you are at risk of electrocution.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2:\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x99 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xe2\x80\x93 This involves putting your feet together, keeping them in constant contact, keeping them on the ground at all times (never lift them off the ground) and shuffling so that one-foot shuffles forward along the length of the other foot\n\n\xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xae-\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x99 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xe2\x80\x93 This involves putting your feet together and hopping out of the area\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5; \nIf you cannot drive away without going over the power line, stay in your car until the linemen tells you it\xe2\x80\x99s OK to step out;\n\nIf there is an impending emergency such as a fire under the hood and you must immediately escape, then keep in mind the dangers of step and touch potential\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8: \n(1) Do not touch the ground and the car\xe2\x80\x99s metal door frame and/or the car\xe2\x80\x99s shell at the same time (as the car may be a conductor of the electrical current from the downed power line; and \n\n(2) Land with both feet together on the ground\nTo protect against these dangers, use the shuffle or bunny-hop methods to move away from the downed wire once you are safely out of the vehicle\n\nsource: https://electrocuted.com/blog/step-potential/\nhttps://www.prairielandelectric.com/understanding-step-potential\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac:\n\n1.He or she is a Filipino citizen;\n2.He or she is a graduate of a four (4)-year course; \n3.  He or she should at least twenty-one (21) years old and seventy (70) years old, on the date of the election;\n4.  He or she is of good moral character (7.4);\n5.  He or she is a member of the EC in good standing for the last five (5) years immediately preceding the election or appointment and shall continue to be a member in good standing during his or her incumbency. (7.5.1)\n\na. A member of good standing shall mean that said member (7.5.2): (Amendments to Section 7 (7.5.1) and (7.5.2) per Memorandum No. 2016-016 April. 11, 2016)\n\na.1. Has no unsettled or outstanding obligations to the EC whether personal or through commercial or industrial connections of which he or she is the owner/co-owner three (3) months prior to the time of filing of the certificate of candidacy;\n\na.2 Incumbent member of the EC Board who will seek re-elections, unsettled or outstanding obligation shall be deemed to include power bills, cash advances, disallowances (including NEA audit findings) and materials and equipment issuances reckoned from the time of filing of certificate of candidacy;\n\nb. Has not been apprehended for electric pilferage by the Cooperative;\n\nc. Has not been removed for cause as director or an employee from Electric Cooperative;\n\n6.He or she is an actual resident and m ember-consumer in the district that he or she seeks to represent for at least two (2) years immediately preceding the election;\n\n7.He or she has attended at least two (2) Annual General Membership Assemblies (AGMA) for the last five (5) years immediately preceding the election or appointment.\n\n8. He or she nor the spouse does not hold any public Office. A person holding an elective position or an appointive position with a salary grade of sixteen (SG 16) or higher or its equivalent shall not be eligible to be elected as member of the Board of Directors. \n\n9.  He or she nor the spouse has not been a candidate in the last preceding local or national elections;\n\n10. He or she has not been convicted by final judgment of a crime involving moral turpitude;\n\n11. He or she has not been terminated from public office/government employment or private employment for just cause as defined in Article 282 of the Labor Code;\n\n12. He or she is not related within the fourth civil degree of consanguinity or affinity to any member of the Electric Cooperative Board of Directors, Department Manager, NEA-appointed Project Supervisor (PS) or Acting General Manager (AGM) and its equivalent or higher position; and \n\n13. He or she is not a representative of a juridical person.\n\n14. He or she is not employed by or has financial interest in a competing enterprise or a business selling electric energy or electrical hardware to the cooperative or doing business with the Electric Cooperative, including, but not limited to the use or rental of poles\n\n15. Any bonafide member seeking election or re-election and any incumbent director shall satisfy all of the above-mentioned qualifications. Non-compliance with any single item shall mean disqualification or termination. \n.\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 :\n1. b'Happy 6th year GM Janeene Depay-Colingan'
b'GM Renato "Ato" San Jose was among the delegates who attended the 2024 NRECA Power XChange held in San Antonio, Texas. Annually, General Managers from electric cooperatives globally convene in the United States to glean insights into emerging developments, adopt best practices, and integrate them into our cooperative operations. This event provides a valuable platform for managers to stay abreast of the latest advancements in distribution systems, particularly in the realm of information technology'

b'2024 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80. \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4. \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae In the 2024 Women\'s Month Celebration, while every female in the workforce was given a day to relax, the ladies of CASURECO IV were treated to a delightful array of pampering sessions, including a footspa, foot scrub, whole body massage, manicure, and pedicure, and an absolute treat of food served in a grazing table, all of which were thoroughly enjoyed by the ladies.\n\nIn the morning, a virtual seminar conducted by PHILRECA focused on Republic Act 11313, "An Act Defining Gender-Based Sexual Harassment in Streets, Public Spaces, Online, Workplaces, and Educational or Training Institutions, Providing Protective Measures and Prescribing Penalties Therefor". Likewise, the topic also aimed at accelerating women\'s participation in the utilities sector. This gender-focused training for electric cooperatives served to empower women, fostering resilience and embodying the spirit of Kababaihan ng Sektor ng Enerhiya, Malakas, Matapang at Malaya. The comprehensive celebration not only provided relaxation but also facilitated professional development and empowerment among the women, marking a significant step towards gender equality in the energy sector\n\n#WEcanbeEquALL'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\n\nThis shows the capabilities of technology. Instead of visiting the site to check the distribution line status where the crew will be working, we conduct it remotely at the Technical Services Department office with Engr. Ric Roberto Gonzales, TSD Manager, Andy Valencia Technical Data Coordinator, and Arvin Ian Adan, Foreman. We strategize and plan the necessary tasks for the day, saving significant time and logistical expenses. #powerlines #PowerLineSafety #powerlineman'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 sa mga nagkapipirang barangay na sakop kan Goa asin Lagonoy para ipadagos ang aktibidad na pagpakarhay kan distribution line puon Abucayan, Goa haggan Bocogan, Lagonoy;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: March 9, 2024 (1 day)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 8:00 A.M - 5:00 P.M (8 oras)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Line clearing activity from pole #209 to pole #258 \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5: So. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5:  On January 24, 2024, CASURECO IV engaged on its first renewable energy initiative with the EnergyTech Ventures Incorporated (EVI) for the construction of the Panicuan Hydro Power Plant, slated to generate 1.5MWp. As previously stated, CASURECO IV is committed to harnessing renewable sources for electricity generation, aiming to lower power rates for our Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs) and contribute to mitigating the environmental challenges facing our planet. Thereby, the signing of Renewable Energy Supply Agreement was held at CASURECO IV Boardroom, Talojongon,Tigaon, Camarines Sur\n\n#renewableenergy #hydropower #climatechange'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7|  Yesterday, Engr. Ric Roberto Gonzales, TSD Manager, convened a meeting with the Technical Services Department (TSD) which comprises Engineers and Linemen. They reviewed the accomplishments of 2023 and presented the plans and programs for 2024, all aimed at enhancing CASURECO IV service to the Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs). During the meeting, Engr. Gonzales gave emphasis on completed projects, and what is expected to be completed this 2024. Engr. Gonzales commended everyone for their dedication and urged them to maintain or surpass their previous levels of performance. #linemanpride #powerlines #powerindustry #electriccooperative'

Maintenance at Naga substation and along Naga-Lagonoy 69KV Line\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e-\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xb3\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d: Naga to Lagonoy 69KV Line \n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95: Tigaon 10MVA, Lagonoy 10 MVA and Presentacion 5MVA\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac: Ocampo, Tigaon, Goa, Sagnay,  San Jose, Lagonoy, Presentacion, Caramoan &Garchitorena (9 municipalities)\nActivity to be conducted by NGCP: Power Circuit breaker SF6 gas leak correction and line maintenance\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized.'

(TROI).\n\nAdministrator Almeda lauded CASURECO IV for its commendable initiatives and technological advancements, particularly the successful implementation of Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA), Geographic Information System (GIS), and Automated Metering Infrastructure (AMI).\n\nCASURECO IV marked a significant moment in its history with the groundbreaking ceremony for the construction of a 3.03 MWp solar farm at the CASURECO IV Campus in Talojongon, Camarines Sur. This initiative not only reflects a commitment to a greener environment but also aims to provide Member-Consumer Owners (MCOs) with a more cost-effective power rate #renewableenergy #sustainable  #netzeroenergy'
b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac:  It is with pride that CASURECO IV has again taken a step forward venturing into renewable and sustainable energy that will benefit both the Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs) and the environment. While we continue to look for ways to reduce the power rate being charged to the MCOs and at the same time comply with the world's program, together with the Department of Energy and National Electrification Administration, toward Net Zero in changing the current state of our mother earth by emitting carbon dioxide due to production of electricity using fossil fuels, \n\nCASURECO IV will have its groundbreaking ceremony where a Solar Power Farm shall rise at the CASURECO IV Main Office, Talojongon, Tigaon, Camarines Sur.\n\nThe said event shall be graced by none other than the most supportive and dynamic Administrator of the National Electrification Administration (NEA), ANTONIO MARIANO C. ALMEDA together with his executives."
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0: \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 (\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96)'
b'TODAY| \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0  \xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 being attended by the Board of Directors, GM and Department Managers being conducted by the National Electrification Administration ( NEA)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x98\x80:  understanding the basics of policy, regulation and standards\n Author: Atty. Ranulfo Ocampo, President PEPOA, Chairman NREB Sub-Committee on Net-Metering\n\nAccording to Wikipedia \xe2\x80\x9cNet metering is an electricity policy for consumers who own renewable energy facilities (such as \xe2\x80\xa6 solar power) which allows them to use electricity whenever needed while contributing their production to the grid.'
b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1. \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95. \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94! May you continue to be the guiding light of our government in Partido with your visionary leadership. Here's to another year of positive impact and transformative change! \xf0\x9d\x91\xaf\xf0\x9d\x92\x82\xf0\x9d\x92\x91\xf0\x9d\x92\x91\xf0\x9d\x92\x9a \xf0\x9d\x92\x83\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a\xf0\x9d\x92\x93\xf0\x9d\x92\x95\xf0\x9d\x92\x89\xf0\x9d\x92\x85\xf0\x9d\x92\x82\xf0\x9d\x92\x9a \xf0\x9d\x91\xaa\xf0\x9d\x92\x90\xf0\x9d\x92\x8f\xf0\x9d\x92\x88!"
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\x96-11 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0:  \n\nThe temperature of electrical circuits has a dominant influence on insulation life. If a loose joint creates a hot spot, insulation close to that hot spot can suffer serious deterioration due to excessive heating, potentially leading to outages. Therefore, early detection of faults and correction or hotspots helps prevent insulation deterioration and reduce the risk of failures and unscheduled power interruptions.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 sa mga nagkapipirang barangay na sakop kan Goa asin Lagonoy para ipadagos ang aktibidad na pagpakarhay kan distribution line puon Scout Fuentebella, Goa haggang Guibahoy, Lagonoy;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Enero 28-31, 2024 (4 days)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 8:00 A.M - 5:00 P.M (8 oras)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Line enhancement and Improvement of Distribution Line from Lamon, Goa to Bocogan, Lagonoy, Camarines Sur\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5: Lamon, Scout Fuentebella, Campo 9, So. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb: \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\n\nToday, applicants for the position of Meter Reader Disconnector reported to CASURECO IV for both written and practical examinations. A mock reading was conducted to assess their meter-reading accuracy and field reporting capabilities, including identifying defects in the kWhr meter, assessing the condition of the meter cover, ensuring proper installation, and addressing any need for fixing or relocation. These tests are designed to ensure that, once hired, CASURECO IV can be confident that the new hire will deliver their best efforts to guarantee the accuracy of power bills served to our Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs).\n\nThe tests were conducted by the Institutional Services Department, led by Engr. Russell James Serrano, Administrative Supervisor Amy Ante, and Engr. Alexis Ortiz, of the Technical Services Department , who oversaw the field and mock meter reading activities. Selected Meter Readers pitched in to assist, while Jessie John Credo and Jane Rogando supervised the activities, bringing their proficiency in meter reading and billing matters.\n\nGood luck to the applicants!'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 sa mga nagkapipirang barangay na sakop kan Goa asin Lagonoy para ipadagos ang aktibidad na pagpakarhay kan distribution line puon Lamon, Goa haggang Bocogan, Lagonoy;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Enero 19-20, 2024 (2 days)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 8:00 A.M - 5:00 P.M (8 oras)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Line enhancement and Improvement of Distribution Line from Lamon, Goa to Bocogan, Lagonoy, Camarines Sur\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5: Lamon, Scout Fuentebella, Campo 9, So. Malabod, Tamban Mabini, Palayan Bayan, Pinamihagan, So. Baliwagnon, So. Maysuwa, Del Carmen, Bocogan, Olas, Mapid, Pagsimbugan, Denrica, Sta. Curz, San Isidro and Guibahoy.\n\nS\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2, b'Presentacion Substation,  Feeder 1 and Feeder 2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97! \n\nThank you Linemen, Control Engineers and Technical Services Department.  \n\nSalamat po sa pagsabot kan mga naapektuhan kan unscheduled power interruption. b'Napalitan na po si mga insulators sa Pole #172 & 174, ma-attempt na i-restore ang kuryente.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c 69\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1-\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5)\n\nSa presente, nagpapalit na po nin insulators ang satuyang mga linemen. As shown on picture, yan po ang may raot na insulator.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c 69\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 (\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6,\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2,\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 - \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb)\n\nThree teams are currently deployed to find out the possible cause affecting the 69KV line\n\nTeam Sol - Conducting pole to pole inspection para maaraman ang kawsa kan brownout na ini nin huri ta sa rehistro kan SCADA sa Control Room kan CASURECO IV, approximated fault is at Ayugao and Adiangao Phase C of Presentacion\n\nTeam Armea - Currently at Maangas conducting pole to pole inspection up to Adiangao\n\nTeam Bonde - of Caramoan proceeded to Presentacion to assist the 2 teams \n\nPasensya na po sa mga apektadong lugar, dai po nagpapabaya an samuyang opisina para maibalik an kuryente sa saindong lugar. Si mga naghahapot po kung hanggang anong oras madurar ang power outage na ini, ma-update po kami from time to time the soonest na ma-determine kan crew kung ano an kawsa.\n\nSalamat po.'
b'POWER OUTAGE ADVISORY \n\n1/18/2024\n\n3:31AM Permanent trip off PCB(sf6) of 69kv line\n\n3:32AM ATTEMPT ONCE TRIP OFF AGAIN FAUT DATA 155 CN\n\n3:36AM ATTEMPT TWICE 255CN\n\n3:43AM ATTEMPT THRICE 163CN\n\nPOSSIBLE FAULT : MAANGAS,ADIANGAO,ADIANGAO AND CAGNIPA\n\nLocation: Ayugao Presentacion Status: Ongoing Replacement of Suspension Insulator PN174'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac 2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 attended by the Management Committee, Board of Directors, Union Officers and to ensure transparency to Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs), we invited 2 MCOs being the MCOs the stakeholders of CASURECO IV and prime beneficiaries of coop plans and programs.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a: \xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Meter Reader/Disconnector\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: Regular\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa4\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa4\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6:\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89: College graduate of any course\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82: With at least 18 hours job-related training\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x93\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x80: With at least one (1) year experience in related field\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: \n\n1. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Enero 17-18, 2024 (2 days)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 8:00 A.M - 5:00 P.M (8 oras)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Finalization of lines (fixing jumpers and primary jumpers)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5:So.Casamahan, So.Maynipa, So. b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7: On January 12, 2024, \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81, \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96. \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2, was honored by Junior Chamber International (JCI) with the \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x97. This recognition celebrates her commitment to public service and active involvement in social work to boost community development in Presentacion, Camarines Sur. She is also an advocate of the government's national electrification project, the total rural electrification thru CASURECO IV, and  likewise  she also played a vital role in promoting economic development through iCare \n\nThe Board of Directors, management, and staff are extremely proud of you! Congratulations on reaching this milestone in your life. Keep making a positive impact on people's lives, and keep building your legacy Mam A! \n\nGreat job!"

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \nELMO SIGUENZA (+), 1963-2024 |  METER READER\n\nCASURECO IV mourns the unexpected passing of our co-worker, reflecting on the positive impact he had with our cooperative and his colleagues.'
b"\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\nBeshies namin dyan sa nagkapipirang parte kan Ocampo, basa bieeee pero kalmado lang ah? Sayang ang tatoo, hay naku hahaha! Oh eto na, magkakaigwa kitang power interruption sa January 8, 2023. An mga detalye nasa baba bie!\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94: January 8, 2024 \n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 9:00 A.M - 4:00 P.M (7 oras)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Tigaon Substation Feeder 2\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7: PN 179\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5:  Portion lang kan Pinit, Villaflorida asin San Jose, OCAMPO, Camarines Sur\n\nRASONS  KUN NATA MA-BROWNOUT \xf0\x9f\x98\x84:\n1. Ma-install ki 3 sets kan Fuse Cut-Out na may amperahe na 200Amps dyan sa Pole # 179'\n2. Ma-install ki primary metering sa CamSur Multi-Purpose Coop c/o Panerio kan Pinit, Ocampo, asin;\n3. Ma-line clearing kan 3 phase na linya\n\n(Napagal ako bie mag translate sa Bicol hehehe)\n\nPaguiromdom besh, kung may concern sa linya, mag apud sa hotline kan CASURECO IV, dai mag dutdot na dai mi aram. An kuryente dai nahihiling kaya isipon nindo pirming buhay an linya para dai pag mitiran para safe sana an satong buhay, oki!"
b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x84'\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x90\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x92? b'Ini po si nangyari kasubago na kawsa kan pagkawara nin kuryente na naka-apekto sa Tigaon asin Ocampo'
b'FEEDER 2 of Tigaon Substation was RESTORED at 8:02 P.M . \n\nFINDINGS: May naputol na primary jumper wire na nagdukot sa steelpole na nadamay ang cable kan internet na naka-attach sa poste kan CASURECO IV na naging kawsa kan pagkasulo na naka-apekto sa  mga suspension insulator kan CASURECO IV kung kaya naging haloy si pagbalik kan kuryente nin huli ta nagribay ki mga suspension insulators.\n\nSalamat po sa saindong pagsabot. Pwede na sa  giraray maghiling ki Tanggol! \xf0\x9f\x98\x84'
b'Unscheduled Power Interruption\n\nTigaon Substation Feeder 2\n\nFidings: Cutoff wire @ Gingaroy tigaon as per reported of Mr Barcinilla( pig trip off na muna ang Tigaon Feeder 2 ta baka may ma aksidente) \n\nAFFECTED AREAS: Tigaon to Ocampo\n\nOn the way na po ang linemen to conduct troubleshooting'

maintenance\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\nIni po katakud pa din kan padagos na ginigibong \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xac, \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94: December 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 & 10,2023 (6 na aldaw)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 8:00 A.M - b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\n\nWhat: \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf (Calamity Preparedness) on  a Consignment Basis\n\nAmount: \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd \xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac,\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac.\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\n\nInterested applicants may obtain further information from the BAC Secretary, Thereese Jacqueline Briones\n\nPRE-BID CONFERENCE: \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf @ \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad:\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd.\xf0\x9d\x97\xba'

b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86: \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\n\nOn November 14-17, 2023 (4 days) CASURECO IV selected employees who have direct supervision with employees who are in high-risk jobs and selected safety officers underwent a comprehensive four-day training program facilitated by the Philippine National Red Cross to become licensed first aiders to ensure they shall possess the necessary skills to respond effectively to medical emergencies. This initiative not only equips our staff with life-saving abilities but also fosters a proactive safety culture within CASURECO IV. \n\n\xe2\x9d\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nIni po katakud pa din kan padagos na ginigibong \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xac, \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94: November 23,24, 25, 26 & 27, 2023 (5 days)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 8:00 A.M - b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\n\nWe've received notice from META indicating a violation of their terms on our page. We want to assure you that we are vigilant about the content we share and do not intentionally breach any guidelines. If anyone played a role in reporting our page, leading to META's warning of a potential ban within 12 hours, we kindly request refraining from such actions.\n\nWe are actively working with META to resolve this issue. If our appeal is successful, we hope to put this incident behind us. Our page is dedicated to providing information for our Member-Consumer-Owners, and we appreciate your continued support.\n\nWe kindly request refraining from negative comments to facilitate a smoother resolution process on Facebook. Thank you again for your support."

any hazardous improvements within the PLC;\n\n\xf0\x9f\x93\x8c Conduct or perform any hazardous activities within the PLC;\n\n\xf0\x9f\x93\x8c Prevent or refuse duly authorized agents of the Power Line \n\n\xf0\x9f\x93\x8c Owner/Operator entry to the property in the performance of the acts enumerated under Section 7 of the Act: PROVIDED that such entry is in accordance with the provisions of b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: Habang papalapit na ang Barangay and SK Election 2023, nakipag team up ang COMELEC sa CASURECO IV sa Operation Baklas na isinagawa ngayong araw, Oktuber 27, 2023. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 sa mga Brgy. Himanag, Sipaco, Mangogon & Balaton para ikondukta ang paglinig sa linya kan kuryente sa laog nin duwang aldaw. Ang detalye sa baba;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94: Oktubre 25 & 26, 2023\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM \n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Clearing of overhead lines from Himanag to Balaton\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7: Backbone line\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7: Pole # 823 & 859\n\nBesh, wala dyan ang barangay mo? \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98, \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91  para po mas mapakarhay ang suplay nin kuryente sa mga lugar na nasambit asin sa mga karatig na barangay, Kaya po magkakaigwa po nin pag shutdown muna kan suplay nin kuryente sa mga lugar na nasa ibaba;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Oktubre 20 - 21, 2023 (Byernes asin Sabado)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 8:00 A.M - 5:00 P.M ( 8 oras)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a Substation\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 covered ng Tigaon and Lagonoy Substation (please see below besh) para i-correct ang hotspot o nag iinit na equipment  sa Tigaon and Lagonoy Substation kaya mahiwas po ang lugar na maapektuhan sa laog nin duwang (2) oras; \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Oktubre 20, 2023 (Byernes)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: 10:00 am - 12:00 noon (2 oras)\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5: \n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89Bilog na banwaan kan Ocampo hanggang Himaao Pensumil; \n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89Bilog na banwaan kan Tigaon\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89Bilog na banwaan kan Sagnay\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89Bilog na banwaan kan Goa\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89Bilog na banwaan kan Lagonoy\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89Bilog na banwaan kan San Jose except kan Adiangao\n\nSalamat po sa saindong pagsabot. Sa guiraray paguiromdom mi po na sa duwang oras na madurar ang power interruption, dai nanggad maghiro kan linya. Isipon ta po na pirming LIVE or buhay ang linya para dai kamo maghiro sa linya na dai aram kan CASURECO IV para satuyang maiwasan ang aksidentedahil padaba kamo kan saindong kooperatiba. Salamat!'
b'In connection with the celebration of \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b, CASURECO IV organized an outreach program in collaboration with Masteral Degree Students of CASURECO IV, Engr. Russell James Serrano, Agnes Begino, Jannet C. Cadores, and Janice Rodavia. Together, they solicited and donated a variety of items, including pre-owned clothing, brand new towels, slippers, and Jollibee food packs to the residents of Brgy. Libod, Tigaon, Camarines Sur.\n\nWe would also like to express our gratitude to the other CASURECO IV employees who wholeheartedly supported this initiative. It beautifully demonstrated how our colleagues stand by one another in every endeavor they undertake. This perfectly aligns with our theme, "\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x86, \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96"... \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\'\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1, "\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e!"\n\n#takeiteasymgakasamasaecyear3 #OutreachprogramofCASURECOIV #2023NationalCooperativeMonth #2023InternationalCooperativeMonth'
b'POWER POLE CLUTTER\n\nSource: NRECA'

San Jose, Oras, Ocampo\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7: 179\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7:  1'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6'
b"\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nMagkakaigwa po nin power interruption sa mga lugar na nasambit sa baba para ipadagos ang \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xac. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 | \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7  \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\n\nOn October 6, 2023, the National Electrification Administration (NEA) conducted the 2023 Search for the Most Outstanding Lineworkers from among the 121 electric cooperatives. Two (2) of CASURECO IV Linemen were awarded, GILBERT GIMANTOG of Mabini St., Goa and ALBERT B. BULUAN of Abo, Tigaon, Camarines Sur.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86. \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc, Deputy Administrator of Electric Coop. Management Services of the National Electrification Admin. (NEA)  said during his speech in the aforesaid event:  "\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86a,  \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc "\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2!" An detalye nasa ibaba;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: Oktubre 12,13,14 & 15 (4 days)\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92: 8:00 A.M - 5:00 P.M (9 HOURS)\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: Clearing of backbone line from Bitaogan, Presentacion to Canatuan, Caramoan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized and never work on the power line without CASURECO IV's consent."

b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84-\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\n\nNagkaigwa po nin pag-reschedule kan power interruption sa mga lugar na \xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 / \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 para magkondukta kan aktibidad sa mga minasunod na lugar; \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92: Sitio Calawan, Sitio Sumaghom, Pinaglabanan, GK Pinaglabanan, So. Ini po gigibuhon na; \n\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbc\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5: October 9,10 & 11 (3 days)\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xba: 8:30 A.M  - 5:00 P.M \n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xba\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb3\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xae \xf0\x9d\x91\xb7\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb: PN 61\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93: Lagonoy Substation F2\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: Line enhancement and improvement of distribution line from Abucayan, Goa to Bocogan, Lagonoy.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized and never work on the power line without CASURECO IV's consent."

b"\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nHi beshies, ito po yung na-reschedule na power interruption sa  \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86-\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \n\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d kan October 3,4,5 & 6 (4 days) para magkondukta nin paglinig sa linya, sa mismong BACKBONE puon  Bitaogan, Presentacion hanggang Guijalo Caramoan na gigibuhon na sa:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbc\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5: October 5,6,7 & 8, 2023\n\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xba: 9:00 A.M  - b"\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6;\n\nOn this World Teacher's Day, we, the CASURECO IV Family, would like to take a moment to express our heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering commitment to nurture the young minds that have shaped us into who we are today. It's safe to say that none of us would be where we are now without the guidance of our teachers. Your embodiment of qualities such as patience, resilience, passion, dedication, and strength of character is truly commendable, and you have imparted these virtues to your students, enabling them to reach for their dreams and achieve great heights and for that, we cannot thank you enough for your invaluable contributions.\n\nEvery member of the CASURECO IV team was once a student, and we take pride in the fact that each of us shares the best of our intellect, service, and dedication, which has contributed to making CASURECO IV one of the premier cooperatives in the Philippines. We attribute these remarkable feats to you, our esteemed teachers.\n\nAs we celebrate World Teachers' Day, we wish you the very best not only today but for all the days to come. May your day be filled with joy and fulfillment. Once again, we extend our heartfelt gratitude and salute you for your exceptional dedication and service. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac' \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2!"

Look for \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95 in the list of \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x98/\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\n\n4.
