Fill-out all the details needed;\n\n     5.1 Amount Payable (the current bill your are paying)\n\n     5.2 Leave the REMARKS blank unless necessary\n\n     5.3 Subscriber name is your \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5; Example: DELA CRUZ, JUAN/MARIA\n\n     5.4 Subscriber Number is \xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5; Example: \xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x93\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x95\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x97-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91. \nPlease note that your account number consists of only 8 digits, as shown in example: 0520-4174. \n\nThe 09-23 represents the billing month of September 2023. This means you are paying for the month of September."\n\n     5.5 On the \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x84, click \xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x94\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\n\n     5.6 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 will automatically set as the date of the transaction. As shown on the example is 10/03/2023\n\n6. Click CONFIRM \n\n7. After completing the process, you will receive a \'THANK YOU FOR USING BDO MOBILE BANKING\' message on your screen, confirming the successful transaction."\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x80: \xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x81\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x81 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xab\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\n\nThat\'s it! But there\'s more important information you need to know;\n\nBDO processes their collection report on the next working day, hence we encourage that your pay your bill ON OR BEFORE DUE DATE.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\nMagkakaigwa po nin power interruption sa mga lugar na \xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 / \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 para magkondukta kan aktibidad na nakasurat sa ibaba:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92: Sitio Calawan, Sitio Sumaghom, Pinaglabanan, GK Pinaglabanan, So. Cruz, San Isidro and Guibahoy\n\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbc\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5: October 2,3 & 4 (3 days)\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xba: 8:30 A.M  - 5:00 P.M \n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xba\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb3\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xae \xf0\x9d\x91\xb7\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb: PN 61\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93: Lagonoy Substation F2\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: Line enhancement and improvement of distribution line from Abucayan, Goa to Bocogan, Lagonoy.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized and never work on the power line without CASURECO IV's consent."
b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x82 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x82 \xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83 ! ! !\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\n\nMagkakaigwa po nin power interruption sa \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86-\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d para magkondukta nin paglinig sa linya, sa mismong BACKBONE puon  Bitaogan, Presentacion hanggang Guijalo Caramoan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbc\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5: October 3,4,5 & 6 (4 days)\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xba: 9:00 A.M  - 5:00 P.M (8 HOURS)\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xba\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb3\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xae \xf0\x9d\x91\xb7\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb: 100\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized and never work on the power line without CASURECO IV's consent."
b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 serves as the driving force behind the reliable and efficient power supply that sustains communities. They design, maintain, and upgrade the electrical infrastructure, ensuring uninterrupted electricity for homes, businesses, and essential services. Their expertise not only powers up our lives but also empowers local communities by fostering economic development and improving the quality of life for all residents.\n\nThank you engineers!'
b'SEPTEMBER 2023 POWER RATE'

\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f:\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9.\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6 at CASURECO IV's Old Collection Office and b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\n\nBesties mi sa Feeder 2 kan Lagonoy Substation na nakalista sa baba, magkakaigwa po kitang power interruption sa Lunes para mag-ayos kan linya para maresolbahan ang namamatiang low voltage sa mga nagkapipirang lugar sa nasambit asin maging marhay asin tama ang boltahe na madaloy sa mga kaharungan;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: September 11, 2023\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: 8 hours\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93: Pole # 275\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84-\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x99\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83: Feeder 2 - Lagonoy Substation\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x85 \xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 & \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\nLamon, Scout Fuentebella, Campo 9, Sitio Malabod, Palay Bayan, Pinamihagan, Sitio Baligwanon, Tamban Mabini, Sitio Maysuwa, Del Carmen, Bocogan, Olas, mapid, Pagsimbugan, Denrica, Sta. Cruz, San Isidro and Guibahoy\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: To conduct LINE ENHANCEMENT AND IMPROVEMENT OF DISTRIBUTION LINE from Abucayan Goa to Bocogan, Lagonoy\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized and never work in our powerline. Thank you!'
b'"\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xac to our very own I.T, \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92. \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 for successfully passing the 2023 ICT (EDP) Programming Proficiency Examination with an outstanding passing score of 93.86"\n\nhttps://www.facebook.com/photo?fbid=608815068099540&set=a.162642756050109'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80| Ini na ang pagkakataon na magpatakod  kan saindong kuryente ta igwa sa giraray programa ang CASURECO IV na hahalion an saindong surcharge pag kamo nag avail sa mga peryodong nasambit sa baba. Kaya satuyang aprubitsaran na makahabol lalo na hanggang Disyember 31,2023 para saindong ma-avail si 100% na hahalion si porsyento or surcharge sa saindong babayadan.\n\nIning programa magpapadagos hanggang Abril 30, 2024, alagad kadikit na porsyento na lang an saindong maa-avail kaya satuyang aprubitsaran ini sa ngunyan. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0:\n\n\xe2\x9a\xa1June 9, 2023 to Dec. 31,2023 - \xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e% ang hahalion na surcharge\n\n\xe2\x9a\xa1January 1, 2024 to Feb. 28, 2024 - \xf0\x9d\x9f\x95\xf0\x9d\x9f\x93% ang hahalion na surcharge\n\n\xe2\x9a\xa1March 1, 2024 to Mar. 31,2024 - \xf0\x9d\x9f\x93\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e% ang hahalion na surcharge\n\n\xe2\x9a\xa1April 1, 2024 to April 30, 24 - \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x93% ang hahalion na surcharge\n\nAn programang ini base sa ipinasang Board Resolution No. 047-2023 na inaapud na "Resolution Approving the Condonation of Surcharges on Power Bill Arrearages of the Disconnected Member-Consumers of this Electric Cooperative for the year 2020 and prior."'
b'The dictionary defines a lineworker as \xe2\x80\x9cone who sets up or repairs electric wire communication or power lines,\xe2\x80\x9d but CASURECO IV knows there\xe2\x80\x99s so much more to the lineworkers in our lives.'

b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 is a time-honored occasion when we pause to reflect on the profound contributions made by the valiant individuals who shaped our nation\'s destiny and marked our history. However, on this day, let us not only pay homage to the heroes of the past but also extend our appreciation to the \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7-\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\xac, \xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e "\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae."\n\nIn the darkest hours, when the power lines falter and electricity is lost, it\'s the \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 who step into the breach. These unsung heroes brave storms, scale heights, and work tirelessly to restore power to our homes and communities. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d, tirelessly safeguarding our public spaces, ensuring our safety with unwavering commitment. \n\nThe valiant \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b who stand against threats to our nation\'s security, their sacrifices ensuring our peace and sovereignty.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 who navigate treacherous waters, facilitating global trade by connecting distant nations and facilitating the exchange of goods toward global economic development and prosperity. They are the backbone of the world\'s interconnected supply chains.\n\nHigh above the clouds, \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 countless passengers, their skill and vigilance a testament to their heroism.\n\nThe whether in corporate offices or small businesses, continuously serve consumers and communities, driving progress and prosperity.\n\nWhen the flames of disaster rage, it\'s the risk their lives to save both property and people\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b the unwavering sentinels of health, dedicating themselves to saving lives and preserving well-being.\n\nYet, above and beyond these remarkable individuals, it is our \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 hearts. They are the guiding lights, nurturing and imparting knowledge to all those who will follow in the footsteps of these professions, ensuring that the legacy of heroism endures.\n\nSo, on this National Heroes Day, let us remember and celebrate not only the heroes of yesteryears but also the modern heroes who work tirelessly day in and day out, often without fanfare or recognition. Let us offer our heartfelt gratitude and a simple "thank you" to these modern champions, for they too are the bedrock of our nation\'s strength and resilience.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b \xf0\x9d\x99\xae\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8, \xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3, \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3, \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x99 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b \xf0\x9d\x99\xae\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xab\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x86 \xf0\x9d\x99\x94\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x90'

b'National Line Clearing Day serves as a timely reminder to all Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs) of the importance of line clearing activities around power lines to ensure a continuous power supply. Furthermore, this initiative aligns with Republic Act 11361, also recognized as the "ANTI-OBSTRUCTION LAW," officially titled "AN ACT ENSURING THE CONTINUOUS AND UNINTERRUPTED TRANSMISSION AND DISTRIBUTION OF ELECTRICITY AND THE PROTECTION OF THE INTEGRITY AND RELIABILITY OF POWER LINES, AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATIONS THEREOF."\n\nThis activity underscores our collective commitment to upholding the power reliability for better service to our MCOs\n\n\xf0\x9f\x9a\xa7\xf0\x9f\x92\xa1 #NationalLineClearingDay #PowerReliability #ElectricCooperatives #LegalCompliance #InfrastructureMaintenance'
b'\xf0\x9f\x8c\xbf \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98, \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x92, \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91 | as the National Electrification Administration (NEA) commemorates its 54th Anniversary, NEA remains steadfast in its dedication to combating climate change as a primary mission. One of the pivotal initiatives within this commitment is the nationwide Tree Planting campaign, involving active participation from all 121 electric cooperatives across our nation. We take immense pride in the significance of preserving our planet for the generations to come. \xf0\x9f\x8c\xb1\xf0\x9f\x8c\x8d #NEAAnniversary #ClimateAction #TreePlanting #Sustainability\n\n#NEAAnniversary #TreePlanting #ClimateAction #CASURECOIV #Sustainability'

6pm\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a \xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x80-\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x95\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf: Presentacion Feeders 1 & 2\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83:\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89WHOLE AREA OF PRESENTACION\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89WHOLE AREA OF CARAMOAN\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89WHOLE AREA OF GARCHITORENA\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89San Jose - b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: August 26, 2023\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84: 7:00 A.M - 6: 00 P.M (11 hours)\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84-\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x99\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83: Naga-Lagonoy 69KV Line\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: Preventive and corrective maintenance along the line\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84-\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x99\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83: \n1. Presentacion 5MVA\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized.'

b'INVITATION TO ALL MCOs: \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x84  \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x85 \xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: August 30, 2023, Wednesday @ 9:00 am\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80: Microsoft Teams or Zoom Application\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x98: Determination of Compliance with the jurisdictional requirements and Expository Presentation\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: September 6, 2023, Wednesday @ 9:00 am\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80: Microsoft Teams or Zoom Application\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x98: Pre-Trial Conference and Presentation of Evidence\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x82 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e. 2023-022 CF, IN THE MATTER OF THE APPLICATION FOR CONFIRMATION AND APPROVAL OF CALCULATIONS OF OVER OR UNDER RECOVERIES IN THE IMPLEMENTATION OF AUTOMATIC COST ADJUSTMENTS AND TRUE-UP MECHANISMS FOR THE PERIOD 2020 TO 2022, PURSUANT TO ERC RESOLUTION NO. 16, SERIES OF 2009 AS AMENDED BY RESOLUTION NO. 21, SERIES OF 2010, ERC RESOLUTION NO. 23, SERIES OF 2010, AND ERC RESOLUTION NO. 0 SERIES OF 2021-CAMARINES SUR IV ELECTRIC COOPERATIVE, INC. (CASURECO IV), \xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x92\x91\xf0\x9d\x92\x91\xf0\x9d\x92\x8d\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a\xf0\x9d\x92\x84\xf0\x9d\x92\x82\xf0\x9d\x92\x8f\xf0\x9d\x92\x95\n\nFor complete details, please see other photos.'
b'COLLECTION CENTERS WILL BE CLOSED  EXCEPT FOR CARAMOAN AND GARCHITORENA TODAY, AUGUST 18, 2023 AT 12 NOON DUE TO THE TEAM BUILDING ACTIVITY. \n\nTHANK YOU!'
b'\xf0\x9f\x8f\x86  \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xb1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\'\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xac!\n\nCASURECO IV has once again soared to new heights by clinching prestigious awards! \xf0\x9f\x8c\x9f which is a testament to the unwavering dedication and passion of the incredible team. b'SCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION to some areas of New Moriones and Sitio Bongliw of Ocampo to conduct line clearing of overhead vegetation to minimize the unscheduled power interruptions;\n\nWHEN: August 17, 2023 - Thursday\nTIME: 8:30 A.M - 4:30 P.M \nDURATION: Eight ( 8  ) hours\n\nIsolating Point: Pole #135\n\nReminder: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized and never work on the power line with our permission.\n\nThank you!'

\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab.\n\nThe event was a heartwarming tribute to these fearless linemen, acknowledging their unwavering commitment to keeping the lights on, no matter the challenges they face. With speeches, awards, and heartfelt expressions of gratitude, the day served as a powerful reminder of the profound impact lineworkers have on our communities. As the sun set on the celebration, the echoes of cheers and applause resonated, leaving a lasting impression of respect and admiration for these true guardians as they dedicate their lives on the line."\n\n\xf0\x9f\x99\x8f\xf0\x9f\x91\xb7\xe2\x80\x8d\xe2\x99\x82\xef\xb8\x8f \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae, \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7, \xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac! \xf0\x9f\x92\xa1\xe2\x9a\xa1\xef\xb8\x8f'
b"As we express our gratitude, it's essential to understand what keeps them proud and dedicated as linemen. The pride they carry in their hearts comes from knowing that they play a pivotal role in maintaining essential services for their communities. The satisfaction of overcoming challenges and solving complex problems to ensure an uninterrupted power supply fuels their passion for this profession.\n#nationallinemanappreciation2023 #ThankYouLineman #thankalineman"
b'Today, as we express our appreciation for their dedication and sacrifice, let us also take a moment to understand the passion that drives them to be the steadfast guardians of our power infrastructure. Their commitment to service and the pride they take in being linemen ensure that our communities remain resilient, even in the face of adversity.'

b'Bilang sarong baguhan sa trabaho as lineman kan CASURECO IV, dakulang salamat ko sa sakoyang mga pag-iriba, sakoyang senior linemen, sa samuyang mga opisyales, na padagos na nagtatabang sako para hubugon sa trabahong linaogan ko para makataong marhay na serbisyo sa satuyang miyembro konsumedores. Makakaasa po ang CASURECO IV na gigibuhon ko gabos para maging marhay na lineman nin huli sa tiwala na tinao nindo sako. Lalong lalo na sa mga MCOs na naga asa na maseserbisyohan mi po  kamo nin matanos.- \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80'
b'"Ang pagiging isang lineman ay aking pinagmamalaki kahit pa kasama ito sa mga pinakadelikadong trabaho sa buong mundo. Bukod sa panganib sa mga kawad ng kable ng kuryente ay may dagdag panganib din sakin bilang kasapi sa apprehension team.. Ngunit kahit anong panganib sa aking bokasyon, ako\'y magpapatuloy sa pagiging sundalo sa pailaw. Ganunpaman sa kabila ng aking tapang bilang lineman, meron pa ring isang nagpapatibok ng aking puso sa takot, ito\'y  walang iba kundi ang aking misis. \xf0\x9f\x98\x82\xf0\x9f\x98\x9d\n\nSa aking mga kabaro, patuloy tayong gaganap sa ating tungkulin na may pagmamalaki sa puso at atin itong dalhin sa pagsilbi sa mga MCOs.  - \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\n\n#nationallinemanappreciation2023 #ThankYouLineman #thankalineman'

b'"Bilang lime man kan CASURECO IV, samuyang tinatao ang marhay asin madali na serbisyo sa abot kan samong makakaya. Ang\nmakapagserbi sa mga kunsumedores na maibalik ang kuryente sa saindang kaharungan ay samuyang ikinakaugma. ini man Ang nagtao samo ning pangaran o kung ano man kami ngunyan. Ini ang nagtatao sa samuyang pamilya ning marhay na pagkabuhay.. \ndawa ini ang nagtatao ning takot sa samuyang mahal sa buhay na nawawalat sa samuyang harong sa oras na kami malaog sa trabaho, alagad igdi man kami nauugma ta napagsirbihan mi ang mga MCO\'s bilang lineman kan CASURECO IV. -  \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\n\n#ThankYouLineman #thankalineman #nationallinemanappreciation2023'
b'\xe2\x80\x9cIf you do what you love, you\xe2\x80\x99ll never work a day in your life\xe2\x80\x9d Ito ang naging prinsipyo ko sa tagal ng serbisyo ko sa CASURECO IV, dahil sa pagmamahal ko sa aking propesyon at sa aking trabaho bilang lineman dugo, pawis at sariling buhay ang aking linaan kahit mag ilang beses naging dahilan na manganib ang aking buhay. Lubos lubos ang dedikasyon ko sa aking trabaho lalo na sa aking pamilya dahil sa CASURECO IV napagtapos ko ang dalawang anak ko na parehas ngayon ay mga professional. \n\nBilang isang lineman tanging nagpapalakas ng loob ko ay ang aking pamilya kahit mapanganib lahat kakayanin. Lahat ng pangarap ko sa buhay natupad dahil nadin sa tulong ng CASURECO IV. Isa sa mga di malilimutang karanasan ay makasali sa iba\xe2\x80\x99t ibang Task Force mula Luzon hanggang Visayas dahil dito mas pinatatag at pinalawak ang serbisyo ng CASURECO IV hindi lang sa Bicol \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84;\n\n1. \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: Make sure everyone working in the area is aware that a generator is being used, and inform them of its location. \n\n2. \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97:  When the main power breaker is left on while the generator is running, it can feed electricity back into the utility lines. This can create a dangerous situation for line workers who are repairing power lines, as they may be unaware that electricity is still flowing through the lines they are working on. This unexpected flow of electricity can lead to electrocution and serious injuries.\n\n\xe2\x9c\x85 *\xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa0\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x99 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c \xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa0\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x99 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xae\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2, \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c \xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8. \xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\xae \xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x99 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xae\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8, \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa0, \xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xac  \xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d \n\n3. \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5: Before starting the generator, switch off the main power supply;\n\n4. \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xac: Turn off all connected appliances and equipment before shutting down the generator. This avoids power surges and potential harm to linemen;\n\n5.\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xab\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6: Use heavy-duty extension cords designed for outdoor use and with adequate wattage capacity. \n\n6. \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a: Follow the manufacturer's instructions to properly ground the generator. Grounding helps prevent electrical shocks and protects both users and linemen from potential hazards.\n\n#thankyoulineman #safetyfirst #gratitudeforyourservice #nationallinemanappreciation2023 #keepthemsafe"
b"\xf0\x9f\x8e\x89 Join us in celebrating \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x9f\x95, \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91! \xf0\x9f\x99\x8c Throughout the week, we'll be sharing stories and highlights of our hardworking linemen. Show your support and gratitude by commenting with the hashtag #\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7. Let's honor these heroes who keep our communities powered and connected! \xf0\x9f\x92\xaa\xf0\x9f\x94\x8c\n\n#\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 #\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91"
b'5:26pm- NGCP Unscheduled Power Interruption\n\n5:31 pm - Restored'
b"Welcome home guys Task Force ALECO This dedicated team spent five days in ALECO who conducted  replacement of faulty kilowatt-hour meters to minimize the system's loss of ALECO. b'\xf0\x9f\x9a\x80 Defying the Storm for Task Force ALECO \xf0\x9f\x8c\x80\n\nThe unwavering commitment of CASURECO IV to support ALECO shines brighter than any storm. Despite the challenging weather conditions, we have deployed another dedicated team for Task Force ALECO, and they are already on-site in ALECO LIGAO. Led by the Supervising Engineer, Engr. Emil Dave Cabais, with his meter installation team  to undertake a massive clustering and replacement of defective kilowatthour meters.\n\nGM Ato reminded the team to adhere to SAFETY AT ALL TIMES to ensure the well-being of our crew as they work diligently to assist ALECO \xe2\x9a\xa1\xf0\x9f\xa4\x97\xf0\x9f\x91\xb7'

b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad: \n\nThe management and staff are proud to extend our heartfelt gratitude and recognition to the exceptional men who selflessly contributed their skills and dedication to the success of the recent Task Force conducted  from July 17th to 21st whom they joined  Albay Electric Cooperative, Inc. (ALECO) spearheaded by  the Bicol Electric Cooperative Association ( BECA); \n\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89Engr. upang ikaw ay maka-avail sa nasambit na programa;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\n1. Kumuha ng Application Form sa pinakamalapit na opisina ng CASURECO IV sa inyong lugar at hanapin si Consumer Desk Coordinator. Sila rin ang mag-e-explain sainyo ng lahat ng requirements\n\n2. I-attach ang kopya ng pinaka-latest na power bill\n3. Mag-attach ng kopya ng alinman sa valid government ID (SSS, Voter\'s ID, Driver\'s License, PRC License etc.)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\n1. Kumuha ng Application form sa pinakamalapit ng opisina ng CASURECO IV sa inyong lugar\n2. I-attach ang kopya ng pinaka-latest na power bill\n3. Mag present lamang ng Proof of Residence issued ng barangay na nagpapatunay na ikaw ay nakatira sa naturang lugar.\n4. Mag-presenta ng LETTER OF AUTHORITY mula sa lehitimong nakapangalan sa power bill \n5. Mag-attach ng kopya ng alinman sa valid government ID (SSS, Voter\'s ID, Driver\'s License, PRC License etc.)\n\nKapag kumpleto na ang inyong dokumento, Ipasa sa opisina ng CASURECO IV na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar at hintayin ang approval. \n\nKUNG IKAW AY HINDI 4Ps ngunit kabilang sa "\xf0\x9d\x90\x90\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xb3\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab (\xf0\x9d\x90\x90\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84) or living below the poverty threshold established by Philippine Statistics  Authority (PSA)\n\nSundin ang mga sumusunod;\n1. Kumuha ng Application Form sa CASURECO IV na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar\n2. Mag-attach ng kopya ng pinaka latest na power bill\n3. Mag-attach ng alinman  sa mga nasambit na Government ID (SSS, Voter\'s ID, Driver\'s License, or PRC ID)\n\nKapag kumpleto na ang inyong dokumento, Ipasa sa opisina ng CASURECO IV na pinakamalapit sa inyong lugar at hintayin ang approval. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab: Mag attach ng \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d mula sa local na SWDO na magpapatunay na ikaw ay lumipat na ng tirahan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a?\nKung ikaw ay nagko-konsumo base sa nakasulat sa ibaba;\n0-15 kwhr - ikaw ay magkakaron ng diskwento na 40% \n16kwhr-  ikaw ay magkakaron ng diskwento na 30%\n17kwhr- ikaw ay magkakaron ng diskwento na 25%\n18kwhr - ikaw ay magkakaron ng diskwento na 20%\n19 kwhr - ikaw ay magkakaron ng diskwento na 10%\n20 kwhr - ikaw ay magkakaron ng diskwento na 5%\n\nPara sa kaalaman ng lahat kung ano ang batas na naglalayon na maipatupad ang programang ito, i-click lamang ang link na ito:\n\nKung meron mang katanungan ukol sa programang ito, maaari po kayong tumawag sa ERC Lifeline Program Hotline Number (02)8689-5372 local # 5222'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x85 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\n\nBesh kailangang patay ang linya pag line clearing kasi overhead ang lilinisan kaya salamat po sainyong pag intindi \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7: \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb:  July 19, 2023 - Wednesday\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2:  8:30 a.m - 4:30 p.m \n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb:  Eight (\xf0\x9f\x98\x8e Hours)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d: \n1. b'11:32am- NGCP Unscheduled Power Interruption again, sorry na besh \xf0\x9f\xa4\xb8\xf0\x9f\x91\x89\xf0\x9f\x91\x88\xf0\x9f\xa4\x97'
b"\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac: \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac! \xf0\x9f\x8c\x9f\n\nWhen it comes to electrical engineers, there's no better place to be than an Electric Cooperative. At CASURECO IV, aspiring electrical engineers from \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac (\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x82) \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac (\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82)  make the right choice by selecting it as their training ground. Here, the trainees are equipped with the skill set required to excel in the world of powerlines.\n\nWhat sets CASURECO IV apart is its dedication to nurturing talent without gatekeeping knowledge. Trainees receive hands-on training both inside the office and in the field, working directly with actual power lines. In our photos, you'll see them diligently working on a mock distribution line, gaining valuable experience with construction assembly.\n\nChoosing CASURECO IV as their training ground ensures that these students will be well-prepared for their future careers as electrical engineers. It's a place where knowledge is shared openly and practical skills are honed. We're proud to be a part of this journey toward a brighter future in the world of electricity. \xe2\x9a\xa1\xef\xb8\x8f\xe2\x9c\xa8\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91: \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 b'In observance of Eid al-Adha Mubarak on June 28, 2023 (Wednesday), our collection offices will be closed. Meanwhile, Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs)  are encouraged to settle their power bills through our online payment partners for bills that have not yet become overdue (\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x87, \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x80, \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab,\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9e-\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5, \xf0\x9d\x9f\x95/\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f,\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4, \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x82 \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xb1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4, \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4, \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9)'
b'\xf0\x9f\x96\x90\xf0\x9f\x99\x8b\xe2\x80\x8d\xe2\x99\x80\xef\xb8\x8f Sa Tigaon naman tayo mga besh hehe pero Portion of San Rafael,Tigaon and whole area of Sitio Pinilipigan lang naman kaya bawal mag overreact hahaha! Pag di nasambit ang lugar, wag pahirapan ang sarili, ang magtanong kung kasama sila naku naku talaga! hahahaha\n\nDETAILS ARE BELOW besh!\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d:  \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x9f\x91\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e, \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91 (Byernes) \n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92: \xf0\x9d\x9f\x96:\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80.\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c - \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92:\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f.\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c (\xf0\x9d\x9f\x96 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac)\n\nReminder: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized.'
b'Mga taga \xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f, TIGAON dyarn (parang kinabahan kayong bigla noh? hahaha), sasabihin niyo wag muna besh mag sasaing pa ako sa rice cooker hahaha! \n\nSo eto na nga yorn, sainyo na dadaan ang LINE CLEARING CREW namin kasi medyo madami na daw ang mga dahon dahon at sanga na dumidikit sa linya kaya minsan nawawala bigla ang kuryente nanonood pa naman kayo kay Tanggol \xf0\x9f\x98\x82\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x97, \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x9f\x96:\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a.\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92:\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9.\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6 (\xf0\x9d\x9f\x96 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 ehe! \xf0\x9f\x98\x81\xe2\x9c\x8c\xef\xb8\x8f\n\nO tandaan na to ha tapos iwaglit sa isip, mag enjoy na bukas habang holiday, mag ipon na ng kuryente (wag mag overthink, power bank ang ibig kong sabihin hahaha!)'

b'SCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION\n\nBeshies sa Goa and Lagonoy, magkakaigwa po kita ki power interruption sa maabot na June 20, 2023 para mag construct nin three (3) phase disttribition line. \n\nQuestion: \xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84?  It increases power efficiency, reliability and increase power (Three-phase power can provide businesses with more power, which can be essential for businesses that use large amounts of electricity, such as commercilal/industrial areas). Three-phase power can provide up to 50% more power than single-phase power.\n\nWhen: \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e, \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91 (\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2) - \xf0\x9d\x9f\x96:\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a.\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6 - \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92:\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9.\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\nDuration: \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xad (\xf0\x9d\x9f\x96) \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\nTapping Point: \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\nIsolating Point: \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\n\nAreas affected: \n\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 - b'So ayon na nga mga besh sa \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e, kailangan nating maghanda ulit sa mga susunod na scheduled brownout. Ginigibo po ang massive line clearing besh bilang preparasyon sa rainy season. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x85\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a 19, 2023 (\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8) - 8:30 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96.\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2 - 4:30 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5.\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2 (8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8)\nAffected barangays: Hanawan, Sta. b'Prayer for CASURECO IV Pole Riders\n#linemenrodeo #WarriorsofLight\n\nDear Heavenly Father,\n\nLord, we  lift up our prayers for our dedicated and skilled linemen as they prepare for the challenging rodeo ahead. We ask for your divine guidance and protection as they showcase their abilities in this thrilling competition.\n\nWe pray that the poles they encounter are strong and sturdy, capable of withstanding any challenge that comes their way. May these poles stand tall and firm, providing a secure foundation for our linemen to demonstrate their expertise.\n\nFurthermore, we ask for the ropes that carry them to be reliable and steadfast. May these ropes be tightly woven and resilient, ensuring the safety of our linemen as they navigate their way through the rodeo. May they be protected from any harm or danger, and may their skills shine brightly as they face each obstacle.\n\nGrant our linemen the strength of body to endure the physical demands of this competition. Strengthen their muscles, bones, and joints, enabling them to perform at their best and overcome any obstacles that stand in their path. May their bodies be resilient and free from injury, allowing them to showcase their talents with confidence.\n\nInstill within them a deep sense of self-assurance, knowing that they have trained and prepared diligently for this rodeo. Fill their hearts with a winning spirit, igniting their determination and drive to excel. Help them to embrace challenges with unwavering resolve and to approach each task with unwavering confidence.\n\nAs they compete, may they display not only their physical abilities but also their teamwork and camaraderie. Foster a sense of unity among them, as they support and encourage one another throughout the rodeo. May they find strength in their shared passion and commitment to their craft.\n\nLastly, we ask for your blessings upon our linemen, both during this competition and in all aspects of their lives. Grant them resilience in the face of adversity, wisdom in decision-making, and grace in their interactions with others.\n\nWe offer this prayer with gratitude, knowing that you hear and answer our heartfelt requests. May your divine presence be felt among our linemen, guiding them every step of the way. In your holy name, we pray.\n\nAmen.'

It involves the temporary interruption of electricity supply to certain areas or customers to reduce the overall demand on the power grid and prevent a system-wide power outage. Load dropping is typically implemented in a controlled manner by power system operators, but can also occur b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x87! \xf0\x9f\x98\x86\xf0\x9f\x98\x86\xf0\x9f\x98\x86\n\nIniimbitaran po an gabos na Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs) na poon \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x96, \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d via website para sa maabot na HYBRID AGMA sa May 20, 2023.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x86\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c \xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x96 \xf0\x9d\x99\xac\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a, \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9c \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9.\xf0\x9f\x98\x98\xf0\x9f\x98\x86'
b'The untimely death of our witty co-worker, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8, \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8, \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8 left us all deeply saddened. He had dedicated 27 years and 1 month of service to CASURECO IV, and on May 1, 2023, Labor Day, he was laid to rest.\n\nRest now Menchu! Thank you for your service. CASURECO IV will forever be grateful to you.\n\nTo the family, please know that you are not alone in your grief, and that the memories of Menchu will be forever cherished. May you all find solace in the beauty and resilience of life, and in the knowledge that his spirit will live on in the hearts of those whom he touched especially the CASURECO IV family and the MCOs. A lot of consumers were saddened by the news that he would no longer be around.\n\nDOB : July 31, 1961\n\xe2\x9c\x9d\xef\xb8\x8f        May 1, 2023'

b'BESHIES, bukas an gabos na collection centers mi sa aga para mag accept kan saindong bayad sa power bill. Still pwede pa din kamo mag bayad sa gabos na bills payment partners mi arog kan GCash, Paymaya, Shopee Pay etc PERO yun ay kung saro lang ang saindong bill AND bako pa lampas sa due date \xf0\x9f\x98\x81\xe2\x9c\x8c\xef\xb8\x8fkung lampas due date na, sa collection centers na po kita magbayad para automatic posted an saindong bayad and iwas disconnectoon mga bi \xf0\x9f\x98\x86 \n\nHappy weekend! \xf0\x9f\x92\x8b'
b'At CASURECO IV, we take power outages seriously and are dedicated to ensuring prompt response in the event of an outage. As shown in photos where our team of skilled warriors of light and engineers were actively involved, working together to ensure a seamless restoration process when the primary line was cut off awhile ago (11:31 a.m to 1:38 p.m) which affected the entire municipalities connected to Feeder 2 of Tigaon Substation (Tigaon, Sagnay, Ocampo and some other barangays mentioned on my previous posts). With their combined expertise, you can trust that your power will be restored as quickly and efficiently as possible depending on the fault affecting the power line.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86: \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xab\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb (\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94 & \xf0\x9d\x97\x96)\n\n\xf0\x9f\x93\xb8 Engr. Dennis Theodemir Boragay'
b'All areas affected by the emergency power interruption awhile ago which affected the Tigaon Feeder 2 Substation covering the portions of municipalities of Tigaon, Ocampo, Sagnay, Baao, Bula and Pili due to cut-off primary line at Talojongon, Tigaon, Cam.Sur was restored at exactly 1:38 p.m.\n\nThank you for your patience and understanding mga beshies!'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad-\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa3\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 (\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1), \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\n\nC-11 Crew : Foreman - Gilbert Gimantog\nLinemen: Aldrin Buena, Romdy Pasa ; Ground man: Jose Perillo\n\nSupervising Engineers: Engr. Dennis Theodemir Boragay and Engr. Alexis Lorenzo Ortiz\n\xf0\x9f\x93\xb8 Engr. A. L. Ortiz'
b'On-going: To restore the cut-off primary line at Talojongon, Tigaon'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\n\nNagkaigwang biglaan na pagkawara ki suplay nin kuryente sa mga lugar na sakop kan Tigaon, Ocampo, Sagnay asin nagkapipirang barangay kan Baao asin Pili na sakop pa kan prangkesa kan CASURECO IV. Sur.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 hours\n\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xad\xf0\x9d\x91\xad\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xaa\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xab
