Salamat po sa saindong pagsabot.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e: Randy Boqueo and Baduria, C11 Special Equipment and Metering Crew\n \n\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xac: Engr. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa \xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 - If too many appliances or machines are connected to the transformers at the same time\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86- If there is a shortage of electricity supply\n\nTo address this issue, CASURECO IV does the following;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf*s - If the transformers, are found to be the cause of low voltage, CASURECO IV  can repair or replace them\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xba - Additional capacity can be added to the system or machines and appliances can be reduced to lessen the overload.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86- Additional supply of electricity can be added to ensure there is enough supply for all customers.\n\nIn general, It is important to conduct a proper assessment of the situation to determine what actions should be taken to address it.'
b'KONTING KWENTUHAN MUNA TAYO BESH! \n\nPansin niyo ba minsan kung may unscheduled power \xf0\x9f\x92\xa1interruption\xf0\x9f\x94\xa6 and di agad po naka punta agad agad ang aming linemen sainyo? ibig lang sabihin niyan, meron pa silang tinatrabaho \xf0\x9f\x91\x8c. \n\nMeaning may nag complaint na mas nauna sainyo pero wag kayong mag alala besh kasi siguradong pupuntahan kayo ng aming linemen \xe2\x9c\x94\xef\xb8\x8f At saka besh, habang nasa labas sila ng opisina, nakikita \xf0\x9f\x98\x8e\xf0\x9f\x91\x80  pa rin sila ng aming mga mga engineers  na naka base sa command center katulad nito besh \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\xf0\x9f\x8f\xbb \xf0\x9f\x98\x8e , \n\n#gpstracker #warriorsoflight'

highlights the criteria that determine whether you qualify for the discount as a member-consumer-owner and likewise provides guidance on how to apply for the aforementioned lifeline rate discount.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97: Amending for the Purpose, Section 73 of Republic Act No.9136, Otherwise Known as the "Electric Power Industry Act of 2001\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa4\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xad\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6?\n\nSection 73 - LIFELINE RATE - In order to provide assistance to poverty line, and to achieve more equitable distribution of the lifeline subsidy, a socialized pricing mechanism called a lifeline rate for qualified marginalized end-users shall be set by the ERC which shall be exempted from the cross-subsidy phase-out under this act for a period of fifty (50) years, unless otherwise extended by the law. The level of consumption, subsidy, and rate shall be determined by the ERC after due notice and hearing: Provided that the ERC shall primarily utilize data from the Philippine Statistics Office (PSA) in the determination of the level of consumption.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xab\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xe2\x80\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9?\n\nLIFELINE LEVE         DISCOUNT LEVEL\n0-15 KWHR                          40%\n16 KWHR                              30%\n17 KWHR                              25%\n18 KWHR                              20%\n19 KWHR                              10%\n20 KWHR                               5%\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5.\xf0\x9d\x97\x94. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae?\nSection 73 \xe2\x80\x93 Qualified marginalized end-users shall refer to:\n\n(a) \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba (\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x98\x80) under R.A. 11310 whose level of consumption shall be within the threshold determined by the ERC as enumerated.\n\n(b)\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x87\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1-\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x84 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x83\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 established by the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA), who possesses the qualifications and none disqualifications under the Act.\n\n*All qualified marginalized end-users shall continually meet the above criteria to avail of the lifeline rate.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2 A qualified marginalized end-user may avail of the Lineline Rate for only one (1) electric service account.\n\n\xe2\x80\xa2 As a general rule, the electric service account with a Distribution Utility must be registered under the name of the person applying as a qualified marginalized consumer.\n\nThe general rule may be waived under any of the following circumstances:\n\n(a) The applicant marginalized end-user is a family or household member living in the same household covered by the electric service;\n\n(b) In cases where the dwelling unit being serviced by the DU is being leased to the Applicant marginalized end-user and the electric service account is in the name of the lessor or previous lessee/ occupant; or\n\n(c) In cases where the dwelling unit being serviced by the DU is being leased to a beneficiary of the 4Ps Act or any member of the 4Ps beneficiary\xe2\x80\x99s household\n\n*\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 Government-issued ID, or a Barangay Certificate\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 A duly-accomplished Application form. Applicants from the area below may get their forms at the following offices:\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98: Ocampo, Tigaon, & Sagnay\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98: Goa, San Jose, Lagonoy & Presentacion\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Caramoan, Garchitorena, North Lagonoy\n\n2. Electricity bill (NOTICE OF BILLING) should be recent\n\n3. Any government-issued ID containing the signature and address of the consumer (e.g, Driver\'s License, PRC, Voter\'s ID, UMID \n\n\xf0\x9f\x91\x89\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x87\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\n1. A Certification from the local Social Welfare and Development Office (SWDO) issued within six (6) months prior of the filing of the application, showing that his or her family income is below the poverty threshold applicable at the time of his application\n\n2. A duly-accomplished Application form. Applicants from the area below may get their forms at the following offices:\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98: Ocampo, Tigaon, & Sagnay\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x98: Goa, San Jose, Lagonoy & Presentacion\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1: Caramoan, Garchitorena, North Lagonoy\n\n3. Electricity bill (NOTICE OF BILLING) should be recent\n\n4. Any government-issued ID containing the signature and address of the consumer (e.g, Driver\'s License, PRC, Voter\'s ID, UMID \n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa9\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\x99 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98?\n\n1. The lifeline rate granted to qualified marginalized end-users who are 4Ps beneficiaries shall be valid within the period indicated in the certified List issued by the DSWD, after re-evaluation, delists the said beneficiary earlier than the original period.\n\n2. In cases where the marginalized end-users is delisted by the DSWD from the list of Qualified 4Ps beneficiaries, the DU shall discontinue the grant of the lifeline rate no later than two (2) billing cycles from the time it received the list of delisted 4Ps beneficiaries. In such instances, the DU shall duly-inform the end-user of his/her delisting based on the latest list of 4Ps beneficiaries received from DSWD.\n\n3. The lifeline rate granted to a qualified marginalized end-users who is not 4Ps beneficiary shall be valid for a period of three (3) years from the issuance of the Certification by the local SWDO, as mentioned under Rule 7, Section 3.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8: \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x98 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xad\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xb1\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\n\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x80, \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe, \xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf \xf0\x9d\x99\x85\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3 \xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4. \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad, \xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae\xf0\x9d\x9f\xae'
b'Maraming salamat sa ating mga bayani!\xf0\x9f\x99\x8f'
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3 (\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xac)\xe3\x83\x84\n\nBesh madali lang to ha? 30 minutes lang hehehe! b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa?!!  Eggs and bunnies have become associated with Easter Sunday through cultural traditions and folklore.\n\nIn many cultures, eggs are a symbol of new life and rebirth, which fits well with the Christian celebration of Easter as a time of resurrection. In addition, during Lent, which is the period of fasting and penitence leading up to Easter Sunday, the arrival of Easter marked a time when people could once again enjoy eggs as part of their diet. This contributed to the association of eggs with Easter.\n\nAs for the Easter Bunny, the story goes that a bunny would deliver colorful eggs to children who were well-behaved that is why we now have called easter egg hunting especially made for children. which has become a popular part of Easter celebrations in any part of the world to make the celebration of jesus christ's resurrection more exciting and fun for children. \n\nParents dressed up their kids with bunny clothes, bunny hats and they bring themselves decorated colorful baskets after attending the Sunday mass, the churches or local governments prepared their parks for this event for children to enjoy.  \n\nWhatever you do today to enjoy the Easter Sunday Celebration, make the most of it! Sa mga bakasyunista, sulitin ang bakasyon, tour around the places in CamSur, just don't forget to include gratitude to our almighty for this opportunity to celebrate and SAFETY FIRST!! Happy easter mga beshies!!!"

b"At CASURECO IV, we prioritize the well-being of every individual.  To show our appreciation to our female employees who mostly are working mothers juggling multiple roles, we celebrated an important occasion this March, the Women's Month. We dedicated a day solely for our hardworking female employees to take a break and focus on themselves. They were able to bond with their co-workers, identify their strengths and weaknesses, and complement each other to create a more cohesive workplace. The day was filled with activities that includes coastal clean-up @ Nato, Sagnay, gift-giving to selected MCOs, and fun games to awaken their inner child. In the afternoon, they were able to relax and enjoy the beach. \n\nCASURECO IV is a great believer that taking care of its employees' well-being is key to creating a positive and productive work environment toward better service to our MCOs. \n\nSa mga beshies namin dyan na babae (at mga pusong babae hehehe!) allow us to greet you again today, as this marks the last day of the celebration of women's month, a happy happy womens' month\n#womensmonth2023 #philreca #NEA"

b'\xe2\x9c\x85 \xf0\x9d\x99\x90 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b \xf0\x9d\x98\xbf \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc \xf0\x9d\x99\x8f \xf0\x9d\x99\x80:\n\nBase sa initial na imbestigasyon kan nag responde na linemen, nagpuon sa cable asin nadamay ang mga kuntador na  naka-install sa poste na kung sain nagkanap pataas si kalayo. b'BEFORE THE FIRE PREVENTION MONTH ENDS, ALLOW US TO REMIND YOU AGAIN HOW TO \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3 \xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2: \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x98\x85\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x81 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc \xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd \xf0\x9d\x97\xac\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xba \xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80!\n\n1. Regularly inspecting electrical connections and appliances can prevent potential fire hazards.\n\n2. Remember to unplug appliances when not in use as an extra precaution to reduce the risk of fires.\n\n3. Practicing fire safety drills and maintaining fire extinguishers can help you be prepared in case of an emergency.\n\n4. Avoid overloading electrical outlets, which can cause sparks and potentially ignite a fire.\n\n5. Installing smoke alarms throughout your home and testing them regularly can provide an early warning in the event of a fire.\n\n6. Keeping flammable materials away from heat sources and open flames can prevent fires from starting in the first place.\n\n7. Always use caution when cooking with oil and never leave the stove unattended to prevent accidental fires.\n\n8. Properly disposing of smoking materials, such as cigarettes and cigars, can eliminate the risk of starting a fire.\n\n9. Have a plan in place for escaping your home in the event of a fire and practice it regularly with your family.\n\n10. Avoid storing flammable liquids in your home, and instead keep them in a separate, well-ventilated area away from potential ignition sources.\n\n#safetyfirst #Firepreventionmonth2023'

b'Sa mga consumers mi po sa Ocampo experiencing power fluctuations, si mga linemen mi po kasubago pa nagtatrabaho para masusog kung ano ang nagiging kawsa kan biglaang pagwara kan supply nin kuryente. It was an honor to enlighten the consumers about the importance of going through the process of becoming a registered Member-Consumer-Owner. We hope that through the discussion of \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x98\x80.\xf0\x9d\x97\x9d\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5. \xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9a. \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 we were able to provide valuable insights, especially to those who are yet planning to apply for connection. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\n\nMga beshies in some parts of Presentacion and most areas sa Caramoan, momentary interruption lang to ha? hehe! b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x92 (\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x98) | \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 - 03.10.2023\n\nThe actual demo was a comprehensive highlight of the installation process for pole hardware, distribution line equipment, and consumer facilities.\n\nThe lineworkers received a thorough briefing on the complex procedures of installing these components, covering everything from preparing the site to completing the final installation and conducting a test to simulate energizing the transformer. Throughout the demonstration, the significance of ensuring safety and maintaining high-quality standards at every step of the installation process was emphasized.\n\nAs a result, the lineworkers underwent an assessment and were deemed competent in the field of line work.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x9f\xaf\xf0\x9d\x9f\xac-\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa0\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\n\nBesh, 30 minutes lang to ha? hehe\n\nWhen: March 11, 2023\n\n\\Time: 8:00am- 8:30 a.m (30 minutes)\n\nLine to be de-energized: Naga-Lagonoy 69KV LIne\n\nReason: Momentary shutdown of Naga-Lagonoy 69KV Line as per request of BBEC to close their tapping point disconnect switch\n\nAffected Municipalities: Ocampo, Tigaon, Sagay, Goa, San Jose, Lagonoy, Presentacion, Caramoan and Garchitorena\n\nReminder: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized.'
b"Did you know that pole pikes are not just a traditional tool but an essential one? \xf0\x9f\x9b\xa0\xef\xb8\x8f They can expedite pole erection in areas where boom trucks can't be used, making the job much easier and faster. With proper training, skill, and technique in pole piking, a pole can be erected within 5-10 minutes, which means a construction team can install more poles in a day. \xf0\x9f\x94\x9d However, safety is always a top priority, so it's essential to receive proper training before attempting pole piking."
b'\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x9f\xae | \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x9e\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x99\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x98 - 03.08.2023\n\nIn this training, linemen were reminded that the level of difficulty involved in \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xaf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 since it requires a considerable amount of \xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xae, \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb0\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb.\n\nEvery lineman must also be able to work at heights for an extended period of time which can be physically and mentally demanding. In addition, the lineman must be able to work in various weather conditions, including extreme heat or cold, rain, and wind. Hence, CASURECO IV accorded to them this training to ensure that they are constantly reminded of their responsibilities and can carry out their duties with maximum efficiency and effectiveness while prioritizing safety at all times.'

b"\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\x94\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x9f\xad | \xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x84\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xb3\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf \xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\x80\xf0\x9d\x97\xb2- Lineworkers are responsible for installing and maintaining distribution system, and their work often involves hazardous conditions. Refresher courses help lineworkers keep up-to-date with the latest safety regulations and techniques, reducing the risk of accidents and ensuring the reliable delivery of electricity to the member-consumer-owners.\n\nThe lineworkers were also made to understand that the pace at which they carry out tasks has an impact  on the coop's cashflow  as power is translated into sales.\n\nThe interactive nature of the refresher course conducted by WFive Safety Consultancy and Training Services not only enhanced the lineworkers' skills and knowledge, but also made the training enjoyable and engaging for the linemen themselves."

b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b \xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\n\nThe proposed reduction of electricity service from NPCs SPUG power plant starting 01 February 2023 is moved to 01 March 2023. This is with due consideration to the ongoing consultations with concerned electric cooperatives, distribution utilities, local government units, and the Joint Congressional Energy Commission (JCEC). We are also expediting developments on the immediate measures currently being undertaken to ensure the continued delivery of power services to off-grid areas in the country. We will provide appropriate notices and updates in the coming days.\n\nThank you. \n\nNATIONAL POWER CORPORATION (NPC)'

The event was held at LJP Farm Resort in San Antonio, Tigaon, Camarines Sur on February 22 and 23, 2023.\n\nBatch I included CASURECO I, CASURECO III, CASURECO IV, CANORECO, and FICELCO. The second batch consisted of CASURECO II, CASURECO IV, ALECO, SORECO I, SORECO II, MASELCO, and TISELCO. The training workshop was crucial for all electric cooperatives as it covered the standard reportorial requirement that must be submitted to ERC as monthly compliance.'

convenience;\n\n\xf0\x9d\x91\xae\xf0\x9d\x92\x90 \xf0\x9d\x92\x95\xf0\x9d\x92\x89\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a\xf0\x9d\x92\x94 \xf0\x9d\x92\x8d\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a\xf0\x9d\x92\x8f\xf0\x9d\x92\x8c If your bill is not overdue, you can use the online payment option, but keep in mind that there may be a 24-hour delay in the transmission of payments to CASURECO IV. \n\n3. b'When we understand the value of electricity, we also treasure and appreciate the efforts of the people behind the electricity in our homes\xf0\x9f\x98\x98\xf0\x9f\x8f\xa0\n\n1. Electricity powers our homes, allowing us to cook, clean, and live comfortably.\n\n2. Without electricity, modern communication and technology, such as computers and smartphones, would not be possible.\n\n3. Electricity is essential for lighting, heating, and cooling our homes and buildings.'

b'The Technical Services Department Manager, \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d. \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a \xf0\x9d\x99\x80. \xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x95\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e, Distribution Asset Management System Engineer \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d. \xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e \xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d \xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x94 and Maintenance Engineer \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d. \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x87 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x91\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x81. \xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e sent off the team to ALECO.\n\nThey took the time to be with our line clearing crew to ensure their tasks will be  completed with utmost safety.\n\nWe thank our GM \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a \xf0\x9d\x99\x95. \xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x89 \xf0\x9d\x99\x85\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 for allowing your crew to help ALECO! \xf0\x9f\x99\x8f It is indeed CASURECO IV pride to be of help.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \n\nNag abot na ang grupo kan CASURECO IV para sa naghahalat na aktibidad sa aga hasta January 29, 2023. Sinda may dara sarong L-300, basket truck asin iba pang kagamitan  na gagamiton sa line clearing.\n\n\xf0\x9f\x93\xb7 Engr. Dennis Theodemir Boragay'
b'\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x86 \xf0\x9d\x99\x81\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x91\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f-\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x81-\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x94 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x82 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\n\nTumulak na ang grupo kan mga ma-Task Force sa ALECO para sa Massive line clearing activity kan ALECO para mahali an mga nagiging kawsa kan UNSCHEDULED POWER INTERRUPTION o biglaang pagkawara kan kuryente sa manlain lain na lugar kan probinsya. \n\nIngat sa byahe mga warriors of light asin salamat sa saindong dedikasyon na maski na ngani oras pa para sa pamilya, mas pinili nindo ang pangapudan kan CASURECO IV sa pagtabang. \n\n\xf0\x9f\x93\xb7 Engr. b'Basa besh  sabay higop higop kape \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\n\nKung ang satong mga appliances sa harong dapat pirming punas-punas, what more ining  mga ekipahe kan CASURECO IV na nagsusuplay kuryente sa 78,000 consumers kan Partido dapat mayong mga takla asin corrosion para well-performing pirmi ang satong substation,jiva?\n\nNata ta ngunyan besh naglinig ang satong mga linemen? \xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\n\nTIP: \xe2\x9d\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x81\xf0\x9d\x97\xae \xf0\x9d\x97\xb8\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xb6\xf0\x9d\x97\xbd\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xb5\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb \xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x98\x86 \xf0\x9d\x97\xb4\xf0\x9d\x97\xbf\xf0\x9d\x97\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\x82\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb\xf0\x9d\x97\xb1\xf0\x9d\x97\xba\xf0\x9d\x97\xae\xf0\x9d\x97\xbb?\xe2\x9d\x9c\n1. Sinda po ang nagatao kan mga materyales na gagamiton sa taas ta kung dara na ninda ang mga gamit, magabaton man bie sa pagsakat ninda sa poste; \n\n2. Sinda ang tiga apud na \xe2\x9c\x85 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbd\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d'\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e \xf0\x9d\x99\x86\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d - Ibig sabihon sinda ang mata kan mga linemen na nasa taas na nagta-trabaho. Sinda ang naga reparo kan tamang tutungtungan, kung tama ang hiro ninda para safe ang satong mga linemen. Sa madaling sabi SINDA ANG TAGA RIPARO SA GABOS NA HIRO KAN LINEMEN NA NASA TAAS PARA MASIGURADO ANG KAPAKANAN AND SAFETY KAN LINEMEN NA NAGTATRABAHO SA TAAS KAN POSTE kaya sinda pirming naka tangad.  matanglay man pati yan bie \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\n\nKaya dai magngalas kung may nahihiling kamong mga nasa baba na mga naka tangad, bako po sinda taga tanawan \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3. b'Biiee, may mga naga message po kung anong oras daa maabot ang kuryente, mayo daang ilaw ngunyan sa lugar ninda, lowbat na daa sinda kaya dalian daa \xf0\x9f\x98\xb1\xf0\x9f\x99\x84\xf0\x9f\x98\xac, biiiieee scheduled baga po ngunyan kan NGCP, bilis talaga makalimot.ng iba dyaaarrnn \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xe2\x9c\x8c\xef\xb8\x8f. b'\xf0\x9d\x97\xa6\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\x9b\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\x9f\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\x97 \xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xaa\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5 \xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x98\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa5\xf0\x9d\x97\xa8\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3\xf0\x9d\x97\xa7\xf0\x9d\x97\x9c\xf0\x9d\x97\xa2\xf0\x9d\x97\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x97\x95\xf0\x9d\x97\xac \xf0\x9d\x97\xa1\xf0\x9d\x97\x9a\xf0\x9d\x97\x96\xf0\x9d\x97\xa3*\n\nSisay nagkakapot kan remote control kan aircon sa Partido ta malipot? Ibig sabihon, \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a-\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xb3\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a-\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8, \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a-\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e! \n\nUsually may naga comment kung pwede daa i-resched, gustuhin mi man po, bako mi po kontrolado ta ang \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2. \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a. Ang kuryente dai makakaabot sa CASURECO IV hali sa generation plant kung dai maagi sa darakulaon na tower/ power line kan NGCP na mahihiling nindo dyan sa ricefield. (Pag nagpa Naga kamo sesh kalag kalag kamo sa uma vie, yan ang power line kan NGCP \xf0\x9f\x98\x86. ) Ngunyan, sa January 7, Sabado, mayong maagi na kuryente dyan pasiring sa substation kan CASURECO IV kaya mayo din po kaming maipapabulos ka kuryente pasiring saindo beshies. \n\nButi na lang malamig ang panahon, kasing lamig niya, ehe!!! O haba ng explanation forda fersons ha?  \xf0\x9f\x98\x86 kaya wag na kayong ano dyan, chill na lang kasi literal na ma-chill kita sa lipot kan panahon  \xf0\x9f\x98\x86\xf0\x9f\x98\x86\xf0\x9f\x98\x86'
b'Paalala mga beshies, close pa an samong opisina sa aga. \n\nSi due date po na nag fall sa January 2, 2023, dai po maghadit na ma-surcharge ta imo-move po ang due date nindo sa JANUARY 3, 2023. Pero kung dai pa man lampas sa due date ang saindong bill, pwede pa po kamo magbayad sa mga online payment partners mi like GCash, Paymaya, Landbank, EcPay etc.\n\nHappy new year saindo gabos besties ,\xf0\x9f\x92\x8b\xf0\x9f\x93\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa5\xb3'
b'Ating salubungin ng masaya at malinis na puso ang taong 2023. Happy new year mga beshies!!! love love love yarn!'
b'Before we welcome 2023, CASURECO IV would like to thank you for all the support every MCO has done to us. When we decided to put up a Christmas tree, all we want is to bring a smile and joy to every one of you, so here are the photos we all want to remember.'

O kaya sabihan mo su mapa shower, i-level up naman, bills naman na tag-100, pipa-electric fan-an haha, bahala kayo maghabol kan nagraralayog na lila \xf0\x9f\x98\x82\n\nPa-good vibes lang ang beshy niyo ta busy ang ferson mag minutes hahaha!\n\nHappy new year ha? b'\xf0\x9d\x91\xa9\xf0\x9d\x91\xbc\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xbd\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xba\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8, \xf0\x9d\x91\xb7\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xba\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xaa\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5 \xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xae\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x92\x81\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xab , today November 1, 2022 @ 10:27 am.\n\nMashaya at maliwanag ang gabi ng lagim mamya \xf0\x9f\x91\xbb\xf0\x9f\x91\xbb\xf0\x9f\x91\xbb\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\n\nPasensya na at medyo natagalan ang mga ferson kasi naman tingnan niyo ang dinadaanan ng mga linemen bago makarating sa tapping point. At di lang energization ang ginawa ng mga ferson mga besh, nag clearing muna kasi may naka tihayang mga sanga ng kahoy \xf0\x9f\x8c\xb3 sa linya \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3. Naintindihan mi po na gabos kita nangangaipo kan kuryente, alagad dai mi po mapagsabay sabay ang mapailawan kamo gabos nin huli ta ang kada barangay, bago po yan pailawan, na-assess na po ang damages sa lugar nindo. Kung sa hiling kan mga engineers and linemen mayo man problema, ini-energize po yan tulos. Kung igwa sa paghiling ninda maski ngani sa panghiling kan bako lineman, mayong problema, dai nguna po yan papabulusan nin kuryente para mayong madiskwido sa lugar nindo. Pasensya na, naging seryoso na si beshie kasi kung ako lang besh may magic, pinailawan ko tulos kamo gabos. b'Mga Power Rangers \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3 kan CASURECO IV beshy mabyahe na to MASELCO para magtabang sa TASK FORCE na kung sain gigibuhon ang malawakang pagpalit ki mga kuntador. \n\nGabayan nawa kayo sa inyong pagtawid sa dagat dahil hindi namin alam kung marunong kayo lumangoy sa dagat dahil ang alam lang namin, magaling kayo lumangoy sa poste \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\x91\x8cdahil un lang ang alam naming alam niyong languyin (ay nalito na ako \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\x98\x81\xe2\x9c\x8c\xef\xb8\x8f)'
b'Wag na wag kakalimutang gumamit ng Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) kapag gagamit ng electrical tools sa work area na basa forda fersons safety \xf0\x9f\xa4\xaa\xf0\x9f\x98\x86'
b'Umayaw na naman sa buhay ang ating napakagandang ibon, dumikit sya sa linya ng kuryente. b"Napadaan lang muna ako mga besh upang magbigay pugay sa ating mga guro!! b'So FORDA fersons power, restored na po gabos na feeders kan Lagonoy. Natalo mi su time table na dapat 5:00 pm mapailaw! hehehe! \xf0\x9f\x98\x8d\xf0\x9f\x98\x8d\xf0\x9f\x98\x8d\xf0\x9f\x98\x8e \n\nMalambing man daw ako mga besh, pwede THANK YOU LINEMAN  AND ENGINEERS ang comment sa comment section? b'Besh na-barbeque ung wire! \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3\n\nIni pong wire na kapot ni Engr. Ojie Bea \xf0\x9f\x98\x84 yan po ang naging epekto kan hotspot! Nagputok na, kaya po kasubago paka restore kan ibang barangay sa Lagonoy, tig shut down giraray \xf0\x9f\x98\xac\xe2\x9c\x8c\xef\xb8\x8f\n\nayarn, intyendes amigas amigos? emergency kaya ung situation kanina besh. b'Tigilan na yan! tigilan na ang pag paypay! \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa3 May ilaw na  ang Feeder 4 ng Lagonoy! \xf0\x9f\x91\x8f\xf0\x9f\x91\x8f\xf0\x9f\x91\x8f\n\nRESTORED Agpo to Baliwag\nISOLATED: Panagan to Panicuan\n\n10 minutes lang imbes na 20 minutes! sabay sabay po tayong palakpakan ang ating mga linemen na manananghalian pa lang \xf0\x9f\x8d\x9a\xf0\x9f\xab\x95 \xf0\x9f\x98\x8d'

\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x97-\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x95\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x82 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f which also applies to all other electric cooperatives.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d!!! Ang pagtaas o pagbaba ng singil sa kuryente ay dahil sa singil ng \xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\x88-\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x92-\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92. Ngunit ang mga electric cooperatives ay hindi kailanman nakakapagpataas kapag walang approval ang ERC. \n\n."
b'Magkakaigwa po nin power interruption ang \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f o National Grid Corporation of the Philippines sa maabot na \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f, \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90, \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac (\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f \xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab) sa oras nin 7:00 am - 8:00 am. Uliton ko besh, NGCP po ang mapa brownout bako si CASURECO IV \xf0\x9f\x98\x8a\xf0\x9f\x98\x98\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0-\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xad: Ma-refill kan S6F6 \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8: Puon Naga hanggang Lagonoy 69KV line\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa4\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95: Ocampo, Tigaon, Sagnay, Goa, San Jose, Lagonoy, Presentacion, Caramoan, & Garchitorena\n\nWARNING: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized.'

of the current power interruptions that were experienced in the above-mentioned areas, hence we have to immediately act on this.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xaf\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2: b'\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d \xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 is also one of the reasons for  \xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 that needs immediate action. But to ensure the safety of our line clearing crew, CASURECO IV scheduled a power interruption to \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\xac \xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2. \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: Line clearing activities along backbone line from Brgy. Bahi Tapping point to Balaton, North Lagonoy.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: September 23, 2022\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84: 8:00 A.M - 5:00 P.M\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: Nine (9) hours\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x85 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x87 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98:  Sagrada, Himanag, Sipaco, Mangogon & Balaton\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d \xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\n\nDue to the increasing number of consumers which also increases the demand for electricity, power reliability and quality has become one of our concern. In order to immediately address this matter, CASURECO IV deemed it necessary to \xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e (\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91) \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa1\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e \xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2. \xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9b\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2. \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7, the soonest possible time, hence this scheduled power interruption. \n\nACTIVITY: \xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xab \xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e Beauty Residences in Coyaoyao\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: September 21, 2022 & September 23, 2022 (2 days)\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84: Both are 8:00 a.m to 5:00 p.m\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than b'Areas connected to Feeders 1 and 2 of Lagonoy Substation, Power is now restored.\n\nFINDINGS: Gecko in the pin insulator as shown in the photos.\n\nAction Taken: Removed the electrocuted gecko and replaced the damaged pin insulator. \n\nThank you for your patience.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x94 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d \xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\n\nDue to a leaking pin insulator at the take-off of Phase B of Lagonoy Substation, it needs immediate replacement today, September 19, 2022. Please see the details below:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: September 19, 2022 - Monday\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84: 12:30 noon until 1:00 o.m\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: 30 minutes only\n\n\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x81\xf0\x9d\x99\x81\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e:\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f - \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 (\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x90\x89\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e) - Salogon, Mampirao, Calalahan, Ponglon, Tagas (Centro), Tagas (Parel), Calalahan(Sitio Dahog), Poblacion (San Antonio), Poblacion (San Juan), Boclod, Poblacion (San Vicente), Danlog, Pugay, Tambangan\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 \xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x90 -\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 - Scout Fuentebella (West), San Pedro Aroro, Mabini St., Tagongtong, Buyo, Gimaga, Maymatan, Abucayan, Pinaglabanan, Hiwacloy, Digdigon, Payatan, Balaynan,Tabgon, Maysalay, Lamon, San Juan Bautista, San Isidro West, Pinaglabanan,Villa Pe\xc3\xb1a, Tamban Mabini, \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98:Bocogan, Mapid, Olas, Sta. b"\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x94 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d \xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\n\nIt has been observed by the Technical Services Department that there are frequent power interruptions being experienced recently in some areas of Garchitorena and North Lagonoy. To identify its cause, the Technical Crew conducted an assessment and found out that ther are damaged insulators that must be replaced. Immediately, the technical services department considered this matter emergency and must be addressed immediately. Hence, we will interrupt the power connected to Maligaya 195 Recloser. For complete details, please see below:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: September 15, 2022\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84: 9:00 AM - 12:00 NOON \n\xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d: Three (3) hours\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 \xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x97\xf0\x9d\x9f\x93 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91:\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x80 - Barangays 1,2, 3, 4, Catnub, Pambuhan, San Vicente, Toytoy, Harrison, Canlong, Del Pilar, Toytoy (Pagdiwitan), Bahi, Ason, Sagrada, Salvacion\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x87 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x98: Sipaco, Himanag, Mangogon, Balaton\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x95\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x98: Massive replacement of identified damaged insulators\n\nThank you for understanding. Please be reminded again that CASURECO IV have to turn off the supply of power when our linemen are working on the power line to ensure their safety. Rest assured that  power will be restored as soon as the job is done.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86: All works may be finished ahead of time and power may be restored earlier than scheduled, so please consider our lines always energized.\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x87\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84 #'\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 : 0929 130 4019  |  0956 812 0059\n\xf0\x9f\x8c\x90 www.casureco4.com"

b'\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb4\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xae\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xaa\xf0\x9d\x92\x80 \xf0\x9d\x91\xb7\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xbe\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xbc\xf0\x9d\x91\xb7\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5 - anytime from now\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9f\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9d \xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac: From Halawigogon to Cagaycay Line Section, \n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7: to isolate at pole#005 to cut the bamboo tree that touches the \xf0\x9d\x90\xa9\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa6\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\xa5\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e Napawon Goa, pole#055\n\n\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\x9e\xf0\x9d\x90\xad \xf0\x9d\x90\x9d\xf0\x9d\x90\xae\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xa8\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7: 10mins\n\nPlease bear with us. b'On August 10-12, 2022 Philippine Rural Electric Cooperatives Association (PHILRECA), Inc. held its  43rd Annual General Membership Meeting and one of the main events is the awarding to electric cooperatives. CASURECO IV received fourteen (14) awards which we want to dedicate to you our Member-Consumer-Owners coz even the best employees run the cooperative without the support and cooperation of the member-consumer-owners(MCOs), these will never be possible \xf0\x9f\xa4\xa9\xf0\x9f\xa5\xb3\xf0\x9f\x99\x8f\n\nThe following awards are:\n1. \xf0\x9d\x91\xae\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb3\xf0\x9d\x91\xab \xf0\x9d\x91\xba\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb3\xf0\x9d\x91\xb3\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xbe\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xab\n2. \xf0\x9d\x91\xa9\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xae\xf0\x9d\x91\xaf\xf0\x9d\x91\xbb \xf0\x9d\x91\xa9\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xae\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xae b'#PHILRECAalaman \xf0\x9f\x92\xa1\nAng straight red line ay nagpapahiwatig ng DSM o ang bayad na natatanging napupunta sa mga Electric Cooperative. Makikita po natin na hindi po ito tumaas simula ng 2010\xf0\x9f\x92\xa1\n#PowerOn #ParaSaOneECMCOMovement'
b'\xe2\xad\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf: \xf0\x9f\x91\x87\xf0\x9f\x8f\xbb\nDai po kita malibong sa binaba kan rate vs binaba kan bill nindo, uki? Pag ang power rate nagbaba pero mas halangkaw pa din ang saindong tig konsumo kumpara sa mga nainot na bulan, halos dai po nindo mamatian ang pagbaba kan bill. PERO, kung nagtipid po kita sa pag gamit kan kuryente tapos hababa pa su power rate, sigurado po yan na mamamati nindo ang pagbaba kan saindong babayadan. \n\nAng dapat po na ikukumpara nindo is si konsumo (ex: 40 \xf0\x9d\x99\x86\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d), bako po su kantidad ta ang amount naga iba iba po yan depende sa singil kan satuyang power supplier. Kaya baga po kami naga post kan monthly rate ta minsan minataas, minsan minababa ang saindang singil sa Generation Charge. \n\nExample #1:\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a: hababa si RATE kan August pero halangkaw si saimong konsumo (kwhr)\n\nJuly 2022 Rate.   9.00      August 2022 Rate - 8.50\nConsumption: 85Kwhr.    120Kwhr\nBilled Amount: 765.00.    1,020.00\n\nExample #2 \xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x92\x82\xf0\x9d\x92\x88\xf0\x9d\x92\x95\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a\xf0\x9d\x92\x91\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a\xf0\x9d\x92\x85 \xf0\x9d\x92\x8c\xf0\x9d\x92\x82 \xf0\x9d\x92\x8f\xf0\x9d\x92\x82 \xf0\x9d\x92\x85\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a\xf0\x9d\x92\x88\xf0\x9d\x92\x85\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a \xf0\x9f\x98\x81\n\n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a: Hababa si rate, hababa pa si saimong konsumo kaya namati mo si pagbaba kan saindong babayadan \xf0\x9f\x91\x8c\n\nJuly 2022 Rate.   9.00      August 2022 Rate - 8.50\nConsumption: 85 Kwhr.   65 Kwhr\nBilled Amount: 765.00.    552.50 \n\nSa satuyang mga consumers,sana ikaugma ta ang pagbaba kan rate ta digdi sa CASURECO IV. Gabos po na nag comment na may mga words na bako maayos, kan hiniling mi si billing history ninda, mas mataas ang saindang.konsumo kan August.\n\nPiece of advice: we want our subscribers to appear in this page professional and respectful, please don\'t use "PANTY NA LANG ANG BUMABABA" or other words na bako maayos. Let us be a good influence to our youth and baka si aki nindo mabasa ang comment nindong arog kaiyan, it\'s not good, owki? \xf0\x9f\x98\x8a\xe2\x9d\xa3\xef\xb8\x8f\n\nHave a good day and be safe \xf0\x9f\x92\xa6\xf0\x9f\x92\x8b\xf0\x9f\x99\x8f'

That\'s an attitude of a true winner!\n#2022nationallinemenappreciationday\n#2022LAD'

b'CASURECO IV joined the other 120 electric cooperatives in celebration of \xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x96\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8a\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x98 conducted by the National Electrification Administration (NEA). This event was virtually attended via FB live and thereafter, \xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xae\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9. \xf0\x9d\x91\xab\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xb5\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xba \xf0\x9d\x91\xbb\xf0\x9d\x91\xaf\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xab\xf0\x9d\x91\xac\xf0\x9d\x91\xb4\xf0\x9d\x91\xb0\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9 \xf0\x9d\x91\xa9\xf0\x9d\x91\xb6\xf0\x9d\x91\xb9\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x91\xae\xf0\x9d\x91\xa8\xf0\x9d\x92\x80, Distribution  Asset Management System Supervisor conducted a lecture re \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x94\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d \xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x85\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8c\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91 \xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8f\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d based on the NEA Engineering Bulletin CS3100.\n\nMoreover, it was also a day of comprehensive discussion between the Technical Services Department Manager, \xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x91. \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x82 \xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e \xf0\x9d\x90\x84. \xf0\x9d\x90\x86\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x8d\xf0\x9d\x90\x99\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x8b\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x92 and the linemen.\n\n#53rdneam \n#lineworkersappreciationday'

\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\nPurpose: \xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \n\xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7: 055  \nAffected Areas: b'\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f \xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x89 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x92 \xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d \xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89 "\xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89"\n\xf0\x9d\x90\x81\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x80\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x83 \xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x85 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\x88\xf0\x9d\x90\x91\xf0\x9d\x90\x84\xf0\x9d\x90\x82\xf0\x9d\x90\x93\xf0\x9d\x90\x8e\xf0\x9d\x90\x91, \xf0\x9d\x90\x92\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xa0\xf0\x9d\x90\xa7\xf0\x9d\x90\x9a\xf0\x9d\x90\xb2 \xf0\x9d\x90\x83\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\xac\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\xf0\x9d\x90\xab\xf0\x9d\x90\xa2\xf0\x9d\x90\x9c\xf0\x9d\x90\xad\n( \xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f.\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90.\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f\xf0\x9d\x9f\x97\xf0\x9d\x9f\x93\xf0\x9d\x9f\x91 - \xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x96.\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8f.\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x8e\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90\xf0\x9d\x9f\x90 )\n\nYou have created so many beautiful memories, especially for the Member-Consumer-Owners (MCOs) thru your advocacy in Rural Electrification. \xf0\x9d\x92\x86\xf0\x9d\x92\x82\xf0\x9d\x92\x93\xf0\x9d\x92\x8d\xf0\x9d\x92\x8a\xf0\x9d\x92\x86\xf0\x9d\x92\x93 \xf0\x9d\x92\x95\xf0\x9d\x92\x89\xf0\x9d\x92\x82\xf0\x9d\x92\x8f \xf0\x9d\x92\x94\xf0\x9d\x92\x84\xf0\x9d\x92\x89\xf0\x9d\x92\x86\xf0\x9d\x92\x85\xf0\x9d\x92\x96\xf0\x9d\x92\x8d\xf0\x9d\x92\x86\xf0\x9d\x92\x85, \xf0\x9d\x92\x94\xf0\x9d\x92\x90 \xf0\x9d\x92\x91\xf0\x9d\x92\x8d\xf0\x9d\x92\x86\xf0\x9d\x92\x82\xf0\x9d\x92\x94\xf0\x9d\x92\x86 \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x82\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x95\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbf.'
b'CASURECO IV celebrates with the National Electrification Administration (NEA) in its 13th \xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x87 \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x81\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x84\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x92\xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e \xf0\x9d\x99\x88\xf0\x9d\x99\x8a\xf0\x9d\x99\x89\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x83 thru line clearing in the distribution lines and keeping our nation green thru tree planting which will happen on August 26, 2022.'
b'\xf0\x9d\x99\x8f\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\xa0 \xf0\x9d\x99\xae\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa \xf0\x9d\x99\x83\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3. \xf0\x9d\x99\x8b\xf0\x9d\x99\x8d\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x87\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x94 \xf0\x9d\x98\xbf\xf0\x9d\x99\x80 \xf0\x9d\x99\x85\xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e\xf0\x9d\x99\x90\xf0\x9d\x99\x8e & \xf0\x9d\x98\xbc\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x99\xae\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xaa\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x99\xf0\x9d\x99\xab\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x98\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa2\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4 \xf0\x9d\x99\x97\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\x9b\xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x80\xf0\x9d\x98\xbe\xf0\x9d\x99\xa8 \xf0\x9d\x99\x96\xf0\x9d\x99\xa3\xf0\x9d\x99\x99 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa9\xf0\x9d\x99\x9d\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa4\xf0\x9d\x99\xa5\xf0\x9d\x99\xa1\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a \xf0\x9d\x99\x9e\xf0\x9d\x99\xa9 \xf0\x9d\x99\xa8\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a\xf0\x9d\x99\xa7\xf0\x9d\x99\xab\xf0\x9d\x99\x9a.'
